translation.en: DAMAGE REPORT! SHIELDS AT 60%.
OUR FUEL LINE HAS RUPTURED. ATTEMPTING TO COMPENSATE.
DAMN IT! WE'RE BARELY MAINTAINING IMPULSE.
I CAN'T GET ANY MORE OUT OF IT.
translation.ko: 망할, 임펄스가 망가지기 직전입니다 - 더 버티기 힘듭니다 - 머리 굴려봐

translation.en: BE CREATIVE.
HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO BE CREATIVE WITH A 39-YEAR-OLD REBUILT ENGINE?
translation.ko: 39년 된 엔진 갖고 뭘 어떻게 하라고요!

translation.en: Maquis ship,
this is Gul Evek of the Cardassian Fourth Order.
Cut your engines and prepare to surrender, or we will de...
INITIATING EVASIVE PATTERN OMEGA. MARK.
SHIELDS AT 50%.
I NEED MORE POWER TO MAKE IT
translation.ko: 쉴드 50%로 하락 배드랜즈로 가려면 동력이 더 필요해

translation.en: TO THE BADLANDS.
TAKE THE WEAPONS OFF-LINE. WE'LL TRANSFER ALL POWER TO THE ENGINES.
CONSIDERING THE CIRCUMSTANCES, I'D QUESTION THAT AT THIS TIME.
WHAT DOES IT MATTER?
translation.ko: 지금 상황에 그건 위험한 짓이야 뭐 어때서?

translation.en: WE'RE NOT MAKING A DENT IN THEIR SHIELDS ANYWAY.
YOU WANTED CREATIVE. TUVOK, SHUT DOWN ALL THE PHASER BANKS.
translation.ko: - 머리 굴리자면서요 - 페이저 뱅크 동력 차단

translation.en: ANOTHER 30 SECONDS AT FULL IMPULSE,
I'LL GET US INTO THE BADLANDS.
translation.ko: 30초만 전속으로 몰아 그럼 배드랜즈에 갈 수 있어

translation.en: PHASERS OFF-LINE.
THROW THE LAST PHOTONS AT THEM
THEN GIVE ME THE POWER FROM THE TORPEDO SYSTEMS.
ACKNOWLEDGED. FIRING PHOTONS.
ARE YOU READING ANY PLASMA STORMS AHEAD?
ONE. COORDINATES 1-7-1 MARK 4-3.
THAT'S WHERE I'M GOING.
PLASMA STORM DENSITY INCREASING BY 14%.
TWENTY...
TWENTY-FIVE... HOLD ON!
CARDASSIAN SHIP NOT SLOWING. THEY'RE FOLLOWING US IN.
GUL EVEK MUST FEEL DARING TODAY.
Tuvok: THEY'VE BEEN HIT.
THEY'RE SENDING OUT A DISTRESS SIGNAL
translation.ko: 적군이 좌현 날개깃에 타격을 입고 카다시아에 조난 신호를 발송하고 있습니다

translation.en: ON CARDASSIAN FREQUENCIES.
CAN YOU PLOT A COURSE THROUGH THESE FIELDS?
translation.ko: 플라스마장에서 나갈 항로 설정할 수 있나?

translation.en: STORM ACTIVITY IS WIDESPREAD IN THIS VICINITY.
translation.ko: 폭풍 활동이 인근까지 영향을 미치고 있습니다

translation.en: I CAN PLOT A COURSE, BUT IT WILL REQUIRE AN INDIRECT ROUTE.
translation.ko: 항로 설정은 가능하나 우회해야 할 것 같습니다

translation.en: WE CAN USE THE TIME TO MAKE SOME REPAIRS.
WHAT WAS THAT? CURIOUS...
WE PASSED THROUGH SOME KIND OF COHERENT TETRION BEAM.
translation.ko: 연속 테트리온 빔을 통과한 것 같습니다

translation.en: SOURCE? UNKNOWN.
A MASSIVE DISPLACEMENT WAVE IS MOVING TOWARD US.
ANOTHER STORM?
NOT A PLASMA PHENOMENON.
AT CURRENT SPEEDS IT WILL INTERCEPT US IN 30 SECONDS.
ANYTHING LEFT IN THOSE IMPULSE GENERATORS, B'ELANNA?
WE'LL FIND OUT.
STILL EXCEEDING OUR SPEED.
MAXIMUM POWER.
WAVE IS ACCELERATING. IT WILL INTERCEPT US IN EIGHT SECONDS.
translation.ko: 파장이 가속을 붙여 8초 후 함선을 덮칩니다

translation.en: FIVE.
Woman: TOM PARIS?
KATHRYN JANEWAY.
I SERVED WITH YOUR FATHER ON THE AL-BATANI.
I WONDER IF WE COULD GO SOMEWHERE AND TALK?
ABOUT WHAT?
ABOUT A JOB WE'D LIKE YOU TO DO FOR US.
I'M ALREADY DOING A JOB... FOR THE FEDERATION.
translation.ko: 이미 하고 있어요 이것도 연방 일이죠

translation.en: THE REHAB COMMISSION IS VERY PLEASED WITH YOUR WORK.
THEY'VE GIVEN ME THEIR APPROVAL TO DISCUSS THIS MATTER WITH YOU.
translation.ko: 교화 위원회에서 자네 일에 흡족해하더군 일자리 문제를 논의해도 좋다고 했어

translation.en: WELL, THEN I GUESS I'M YOURS.
YOUR FATHER TAUGHT ME A GREAT DEAL.
I WAS HIS SCIENCE OFFICER DURING THE ARIAS EXPEDITION.
translation.ko: 아리아스 탐사 때 과학 장교로 합류했지

translation.en: YOU MUST BE GOOD.
MY FATHER ONLY ACCEPTS THE BEST AND THE BRIGHTEST.
I'M LEAVING ON A MISSION
TO FIND A MAQUIS SHIP THAT DISAPPEARED
translation.ko: 마키 함선을 찾으라는 임무를 받았어 일주일 전 배드랜즈로 사라졌거든

translation.en: IN THE BADLANDS A WEEK AGO.
I WOULDN'T, IF I WERE YOU.
REALLY?
I'VE NEVER SEEN A FEDERATION STARSHIP
THAT COULD MANEUVER THROUGH THE PLASMA STORMS.
YOU'VE NEVER SEEN VOYAGER.
WE'D LIKE YOU TO COME ALONG.
YOU'D LIKE ME TO LEAD YOU TO MY FORMER COLLEAGUES.
translation.ko: 제 옛 동료 찾는 데 앞장서라고요?

translation.en: I WAS ONLY WITH THE MAQUIS A FEW WEEKS BEFORE I WAS CAPTURED, CAPTAIN.
translation.ko: 가입하고 얼마 안 돼서 붙잡힌 거라

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHERE MOST OF THEIR HIDING PLACES ARE.
translation.ko: 가입하고 얼마 안 돼서 붙잡힌 거라 그 사람들 은신처 잘 몰라요

translation.en: YOU KNOW THE TERRITORY BETTER THAN ANYONE WE'VE GOT.
WHAT'S SO IMPORTANT ABOUT THIS PARTICULAR MAQUIS SHIP?
translation.ko: 그 마키 함선이 왜 그렇게 중요하죠?

translation.en: MY CHIEF OF SECURITY WAS ON BOARD-- UNDERCOVER.
translation.ko: 우리 쪽 보안실장이 위장 잠입해 타고 있어

translation.en: HE WAS SUPPOSED TO REPORT IN TWICE DURING THE LAST SIX DAYS.
HE DIDN'T.
MAYBE IT'S JUST YOUR CHIEF OF SECURITY WHO'S DISAPPEARED.
MAYBE.
WAS UNDER THE COMMAND OF ANOTHER FORMER STARFLEET OFFICER
NAMED CHAKOTAY.
I UNDERSTAND YOU KNEW HIM.
THAT'S RIGHT.
THE TWO OF YOU DIDN'T GET ALONG TOO WELL, I'M TOLD.
CHAKOTAY WILL TELL YOU HE LEFT STARFLEET ON PRINCIPLE--
translation.ko: 차코테는 원칙에 따라 사임한 거라고 하죠

translation.en: TO DEFEND HIS HOME COLONY FROM THE CARDASSIANS.
I, ON THE OTHER HAND, WAS FORCED TO RESIGN.
HE CONSIDERED ME A MERCENARY--
WILLING TO FIGHT FOR ANYONE WHO'D PAY MY BAR BILLS.
HE WAS RIGHT.
TRACK DOWN MY "FRIENDS" IN THE MAQUIS, CAPTAIN.
translation.ko: 제 마키 동지들 찾는 거 도와드릴 순 있습니다

translation.en: ALL I NEED TO KNOW FROM YOU IS WHAT'S IN IT FOR ME?
translation.ko: 그 대가로 제가 얻는 건 뭐죠?

translation.en: YOU HELP US FIND THAT SHIP
WE HELP YOU AT YOUR NEXT OUTMATE REVIEW.
YOU'D BE A STARFLEET OBSERVER DURING THE MISSION.
OBSERVER?
OH, HELL. I'M THE BEST PILOT YOU COULD HAVE.
YOU'LL BE AN OBSERVER.
WHEN IT'S OVER, YOU'RE CUT LOOSE.
STORY OF MY LIFE.
STADI, YOU'RE CHANGING MY MIND ABOUT BETAZOIDS.
translation.ko: 스타디, 당신 덕분에 베타제드인 다시 봤어요

translation.en: GOOD.
OH, THAT WASN'T A COMPLIMENT.
UNTIL TODAY, I ALWAYS CONSIDERED YOUR PEOPLE WARM AND SENSUAL.
I CAN BE WARM AND SENSUAL.
JUST NOT TO ME.
DO YOU ALWAYS FLY AT WOMEN AT WARP SPEED, MR. PARIS?
translation.ko: 원래 이렇게 여자한테 워프 속도로 들이대나?

translation.en: ONLY WHEN THEY'RE IN VISUAL RANGE.
THAT'S OUR SHIP.
THAT'S VOYAGER.
INTREPID CLASS--
SUSTAINABLE CRUISE VELOCITY OF WARP FACTOR 9.975.
15 DECKS, CREW COMPLEMENT OF 141
BIO-NEURAL CIRCUITRY.
BIO-NEURAL? SOME OF THE TRADITIONAL
CIRCUITRY HAS BEEN REPLACED BY GEL PACKS
translation.ko: 기존 회로 일부를 생체 신경 세포가 담긴

translation.en: THAT CONTAIN BIO-NEURAL CELLS.
THEY ORGANIZE INFORMATION MORE EFFICIENTLY
SPEED UP RESPONSE TIME.
IF I MAY SAY SO, IT'S BEEN MY SPECIAL PLEASURE
TO SEE MANY NEW OFFICERS LIKE YOURSELF COME THROUGH THESE PORTALS.
translation.ko: 어려운 관문을 뚫고 장교가 된 분을 보면요

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS MUST BE VERY PROUD, MY BOY.
YOU KNOW, ON AN OCCASION LIKE THIS...
I'M REALLY NOT INTERESTED.
translation.ko: 이런 특별한 날엔... - 관심 없어요 - 무슨?

translation.en: INTERESTED?
YOU WERE ABOUT TO TRY TO SELL ME SOMETHING.
I WAS GOING TO SUGGEST
YOUR PARENTS MIGHT APPRECIATE A MEMENTO.
AND YOU HAPPEN TO HAVE SEVERAL TO CHOOSE FROM.
translation.ko: 첫 임무를 기념한 효도 선물 마침 그럴 만한 선물이 있고요?

translation.en: I DO CARRY A SELECT LINE OF UNIQUE ARTIFACTS AND GEMSTONES
translation.ko: 마침 이 지역 특산물인 공예품과 원석을

translation.en: INDIGENOUS TO THIS REGION.
QUITE RECENTLY
translation.ko: 종류별로 갖고 있답니다 게다가 조금 전에 이 로바이 크리스털을

translation.en: I ACQUIRED THESE LOBI CRYSTALS
translation.ko: 게다가 조금 전에 이 로바이 크리스털을

translation.en: FROM A VERY STRANGE CREATURE CALLED A MORN.
translation.ko: 게다가 조금 전에 이 로바이 크리스털을 매우 희귀한 존재인 모온한테서 받았죠

translation.en: WE WERE WARNED ABOUT THE FERENGI AT THE ACADEMY.
WARNED ABOUT FERENGI, WERE YOU?
THAT'S RIGHT.
SLURS ABOUT MY PEOPLE AT STARFLEET ACADEMY.
WHAT I MEANT WAS... HERE I AM, TRYING TO BE
translation.ko: 그게 아니고... 이곳 주인으로서 애정 어린 마음으로

translation.en: A CORDIAL HOST, KNOWING HOW MUCH
translation.ko: 이곳 주인으로서 애정 어린 마음으로 갓 장교가 된 이에게 위험한 임무에 앞서

translation.en: A YOUNG OFFICER'S PARENTS WOULD APPRECIATE
translation.ko: 갓 장교가 된 이에게 위험한 임무에 앞서

translation.en: A TOKEN OF HIS LOVE ON THE EVE OF A DANGEROUS MISSION
AND WHAT DO I GET FOR MY TROUBLE?
SCURRILOUS INSULTS.
WELL, SOMEBODY'S GOING TO HEAR ABOUT THIS.
WHAT'S YOUR NAME, SON?
MY... NAME?
YOU HAVE ONE, I PRESUME?
KIM, HARRY KIM, BUT I...
AND WHO WAS IT AT THE ACADEMY WHO WARNED YOU ABOUT FERENGI?
I THINK A MEMENTO FOR MY PARENTS WOULD BE A GREAT IDEA.
translation.ko: 선물 드리는 거 좋은 것 같아요

translation.en: OH, NO, NO, NO, NO, NO!
REALLY? ONE WOULD MAKE A GREAT PENDANT FOR MY MOTHER.
OR CUFFLINKS FOR YOUR FATHER.
translation.ko: 이거요, 엄마한테는 펜던트가 좋겠죠? - 아빠는 커프 링크스 - 커프 링크스, 좋아요

translation.en: CUFFLINKS. GREAT IDEA.
translation.ko: - 아빠는 커프 링크스 - 커프 링크스, 좋아요

translation.en: THEY'RE NOT FOR SALE.
NOW, INFORM YOUR COMMANDING OFFICER
THAT THE FEDERATION COUNCIL CAN EXPECT AN OFFICIAL QUERY...
translation.ko: 누군진 몰라도 그쪽 사령관께 알려요 내가 연방 의회에 공식적으로...

translation.en: HOW MUCH FOR THE ENTIRE TRAY?
translation.ko: 내가 연방 의회에 공식적으로... 이거 다 얼마예요?

translation.en: CASH OR CREDIT?
DAZZLING, AREN'T THEY?
AS BRIGHT AS A KOLADAN DIAMOND.
BRIGHTER.
AND YOU CAN FIND THEM ON ANY PLANET IN THIS SYSTEM.
translation.ko: 이 항성계 어디에도 이건 없을 텐데

translation.en: THAT'S AN EXAGGERATION.
translation.ko: 과장이에요 볼나르 콜로니에 있는 한 상점에서

translation.en: THERE'S A SHOP AT THE VOLNAR COLONY
THAT SELLS A DOZEN ASSORTED SHAPES FOR ONE CARDASSIAN LEK.
HOW MUCH YOU SELLING THESE FOR?
WE WERE JUST ABOUT TO NEGOTIATE THE PRICE.
THANKS.
DIDN'T THEY WARN YOU ABOUT FERENGI
RUN A LEVEL THREE DIAGNOSTIC JUST TO BE SURE.
CAN I HELP YOU?
TOM PARIS, REPORTING ON BOARD.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이시죠? 톰 패리스 승선 신고합니다

translation.en: OH, YES.
THE OBSERVER.
Paris: THAT'S ME.
AS A MATTER OF FACT I SEEM TO BE OBSERVING
SOME KIND OF PROBLEM RIGHT NOW...
DOCTOR.
I WAS A SURGEON AT THE HOSPITAL ON CALDIK PRIME
translation.ko: 칼딕 프라임에서 외과의로 일한 적 있는데

translation.en: THE SAME TIME YOU WERE STATIONED THERE.
WE NEVER ACTUALLY MET.
YOUR MEDICAL RECORDS HAVE ARRIVED FROM YOUR LAST POSTING, MR. PARIS.
EVERYTHING SEEMS TO BE IN ORDER.
THE CAPTAIN ASKED IF YOU WERE ON BOARD. YOU SHOULD CHECK IN.
TO THE CAPTAIN YET EITHER.
WELL, MR. KIM, THAT WOULD BE A GOOD THING FOR A NEW OPERATIONS OFFICER TO DO.
translation.ko: 새 운영 장교로 왔으면 선장님은 봬야지

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT ABOUT?
IT'S A LONG STORY AND I'M TIRED OF TELLING IT.
I'M SURE SOMEONE WILL TELL YOU BEFORE LONG.
Man: The doctor called, and I was right.
SHE'S PREGNANT?
Puppies are due in seven weeks.
OH, TAKE HER HOME WITH YOU. With me?
translation.ko: 마크, 몰리 좀 자기 집에 데려가

translation.en: I just got the rugs cleaned.
I CAN'T LEAVE HER IN A KENNEL WHILE I...
Is this another "love me, love my dog" demand?
translation.ko: 그런 애를 사육장에... 날 사랑하면 내 개도 사랑해라?

translation.en: YES.
How could I ever refuse you?
THANKS, HONEY.
When are you leaving?
AS SOON AS I APPROVE THESE STATUS REPORTS.
All right, then I won't bother you anymore.
HEY...
YOU NEVER BOTHER ME.
EXCEPT THE WAY I LOVE TO BE BOTHERED.
UNDERSTAND?
I'll remember that.
SEE YOU IN A FEW WEEKS.
OH, MARK, GO BY MY HOUSE AND PICK UP THE DOGGY BED.
SHE'LL BE MORE COMFORTABLE.
I already did.
An hour ago.
COME IN.
GENTLEMEN, WELCOME ABOARD VOYAGER.
THANK YOU, SIR.
MR. KIM...
AT EASE BEFORE YOU SPRAIN SOMETHING.
ENSIGN, DESPITE STARFLEET PROTOCOL I DON'T LIKE BEING ADDRESSED AS "SIR."
translation.ko: 소위, 난 선생님이라는 호칭을 좋아하지 않아

translation.en: I'M SORRY... MA'AM.
"MA'AM" IS ACCEPTABLE IN A CRUNCH. BUT I PREFER "CAPTAIN."
translation.ko: 급할 땐 그것도 좋지만 선장님이 좋겠군

translation.en: WE'RE GETTING READY TO LEAVE. LET ME SHOW YOU TO THE BRIDGE.
DID YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS GETTING HERE, MR. PARIS?
NONE AT ALL, CAPTAIN.
Janeway: MY FIRST OFFICER, LIEUTENANT COMMANDER CAVIT.
ENSIGN KIM, MR. PARIS.
WELCOME ABOARD.
Janeway: ENSIGN KIM THIS IS YOUR STATION.
WOULD YOU LIKE TO TAKE OVER?
YES, MA'AM.
IT'S NOT CRUNCH TIME YET, MR. KIM.
I'LL LET YOU KNOW WHEN.
LIEUTENANT STADI, LAY IN THE COURSE AND CLEAR OUR DEPARTURE WITH OPERATIONS.
translation.ko: 스타디, 항로 설정하고 사령실에 출발 승인 요청해

translation.en: COURSE ENTERED, OPS HAS CLEARED US.
READY THRUSTERS.
THRUSTERS READY.
INITIATE LAUNCHING SEQUENCE.
Stadi: SEQUENCE UNDERWAY.
ENGAGE.
TOMATO SOUP.
There are 14 varieties of tomato soup available
from this replicator--
with rice, with vegetables, Bolian-style, with pasta...
translation.ko: 종류를 선택하세요 라이스, 채소 볼리언식, 파스타...

translation.en: PLAIN.
Specify hot or chilled.
HOT!
HOT, PLAIN TOMATO SOUP.
I TOLD YOU IT WOULDN'T TAKE LONG.
IS IT TRUE?
WAS THE ACCIDENT MY FAULT?
YES-- PILOT ERROR-- BUT IT TOOK ME A WHILE TO ADMIT IT.
translation.ko: 맞아, 조종사 과실 인정하기 쉽진 않았지만

translation.en: UGH! 14 VARIETIES AND THEY CAN'T GET PLAIN TOMATO SOUP RIGHT.
THEY SAID YOU FALSIFIED REPORTS.
THAT'S RIGHT. WHY?
WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE? I LIED.
BUT THEN YOU CAME FORWARD AND ADMITTED IT WAS YOUR FAULT?
translation.ko: 그래 놓고 말 바꿔서 잘못을 인정해요?

translation.en: I'LL TELL YOU THE TRUTH, HARRY.
ALL I HAD TO DO WAS KEEP MY MOUTH SHUT
translation.ko: 내가 입만 안 열면 아무도 모를 일이었어

translation.en: AND I WAS HOME FREE, BUT I COULDN'T.
translation.ko: 내가 입만 안 열면 아무도 모를 일이었어 그게 안 됐지

translation.en: THE GHOSTS OF THOSE THREE DEAD OFFICERS CAME TO ME IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT
AND TAUGHT ME THE TRUE MEANING OF CHRISTMAS.
SO I CONFESSED--
WORST MISTAKE I EVER MADE BUT NOT MY LAST.
AFTER THEY CASHIERED ME OUT OF STARFLEET
I WENT OUT LOOKING FOR A FIGHT AND FOUND THE MAQUIS
AND ON MY FIRST ASSIGNMENT, I WAS CAUGHT.
translation.ko: 첫 임무에 나갔다가 그 길로 붙잡혔어

translation.en: THAT MUST HAVE BEEN ESPECIALLY TOUGH FOR YOU
BEING THE SON OF AN ADMIRAL.
FRANKLY, I THINK IT WAS TOUGHER ON MY FATHER THAN IT WAS ON ME.
LOOK, I KNOW THOSE GUYS TOLD YOU TO STAY AWAY FROM ME
translation.ko: 이봐 저 친구들이 날 멀리하라고 했지?

translation.en: AND YOU KNOW WHAT?
YOU OUGHT TO LISTEN TO THEM.
I'M NOT EXACTLY A GOOD-LUCK CHARM.
translation.ko: 내가 딱히 행운을 몰고 다니진 않아

translation.en: I DON'T NEED ANYONE TO CHOOSE MY FRIENDS FOR ME.
translation.ko: 다른 사람 말 듣고 친구 고르진 않아요

translation.en: Janeway to Paris.
GO AHEAD.
Report to the Bridge. We're approaching the Badlands.
Man: PLASMA STORMS WERE MEASURED AT LEVELS THREE AND FOUR.
THE CARDASSIANS GAVE US THE LAST KNOWN HEADING
OF THE MAQUIS SHIP, AND WE HAVE CHARTS
translation.ko: 최종 방위를 알려줬고 이 도표를 보면 플라스마 폭풍의 활동 변화도 알 수 있어

translation.en: OF THE PLASMA STORM ACTIVITY THE DAY IT DISAPPEARED.
translation.ko: 플라스마 폭풍의 활동 변화도 알 수 있어 조금만 더 알아내면 항로가 나올 텐데

translation.en: WE MIGHT BE ABLE TO APPROXIMATE ITS COURSE.
translation.ko: 조금만 더 알아내면 항로가 나올 텐데

translation.en: I'D GUESS THEY WERE HEADING
TO ONE OF THE PLANETOIDS IN THE TERIKOF BELT.
THE PLASMA STORMS WOULD HAVE FORCED
translation.ko: 모리야계 밖이에요 플라스마 폭풍 때문에 이쪽으로 갔을 겁니다

translation.en: THEM IN THIS DIRECTION.
translation.ko: 플라스마 폭풍 때문에 이쪽으로 갔을 겁니다

translation.en: Janeway: ADJUST OUR COURSE TO MATCH.
THE CARDASSIANS CLAIM THEY FORCED
translation.ko: 알겠습니다 카다시아는 마키 함선을 플라스마 폭풍으로 몰아

translation.en: THE MAQUIS SHIP INTO A PLASMA STORM
translation.ko: 카다시아는 마키 함선을 플라스마 폭풍으로 몰아

translation.en: WHERE IT WAS DESTROYED, BUT THERE'S NO DEBRIS.
translation.ko: 폭파했다고 하는데 아직 잔해가 감지되지 않았어

translation.en: A PLASMA STORM MIGHT NOT LEAVE ANY DEBRIS.
translation.ko: 아직 잔해가 감지되지 않았어 폭풍에 잔해가 남지 않았을 거예요

translation.en: WE'D STILL BE ABLE TO PICK UP
A RESONANCE TRACE FROM THE WARP CORE.
translation.ko: 그래도 공명 신호는 포착할 수 있잖아

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I'M READING
A COHERENT TETRION BEAM SCANNING US.
ORIGIN, MR. KIM?
NOT SURE. THERE'S ALSO A DISPLACEMENT WAVE
MOVING TOWARD US.
translation.ko: 전방에 변위파가 접근 중입니다 영상 띄워

translation.en: ANALYSIS.
SOME KIND OF POLARIZED MAGNETIC VARIATION.
translation.ko: 유극 자기 편차의 일종인 것 같습니다

translation.en: WE MIGHT DISPERSE IT WITH A GRAVITON PARTICLE FIELD.
translation.ko: 중력자장으로 분산시킬 수 있을 겁니다 가동해

translation.en: DO IT. RED ALERT. MOVE US AWAY FROM IT, LIEUTENANT.
NEW HEADING 4-1 MARK 1-8-0.
INITIATING GRAVITON FIELD.
GRAVITON FIELD HAD NO EFFECT.
FULL IMPULSE.
IN 12 SECONDS.
CAN WE GO TO WARP?
NOT UNTIL WE CLEAR THE PLASMA FIELD.
Kim: FIVE SECONDS.
BRACE FOR IMPACT.
THREE...
REPORT.
HULL BREACH, DECK 14. COM LINES TO ENGINEERING ARE DOWN.
translation.ko: 14번 갑판 선체 파손 기관실 통신 연결 불가 재연결 시도 중

translation.en: TRYING TO REESTABLISH.
translation.ko: 기관실 통신 연결 불가 재연결 시도 중

translation.en: REPAIR CREWS, SEAL OFF HULL BREACH ON DECK 14. Aye, Captain.
Crewman: CASUALTY REPORTS COMING IN.
SICK BAY IS NOT RESPONDING.
BRIDGE TO SICK BAY.
DOCTOR, CAN YOU HEAR ME?
PARIS, HOW'S STADI?
SHE'S DEAD.
SOMETHING'S OUT THERE.
I NEED A BETTER DESCRIPTION THAN THAT, MR. KIM.
translation.ko: 그보다 더 정확하게 말할 순 없나?

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW.
I'M NOT SURE WHAT I'M READING.
CAN YOU GET THE VIEWSCREEN OPERATIONAL?
I'M TRYING.
IF THESE SENSORS ARE WORKING
WE'RE OVER 70,000 LIGHT YEARS FROM WHERE WE WERE.
translation.ko: 현재 위치는 지난 좌표에서 7만 광년 밖입니다

translation.en: WE'RE ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE GALAXY.
I'M NOT READING ANY LIFE SIGNS ON THE MAQUIS SHIP.
translation.ko: 마키 함선 내 생명 반응이 없습니다

translation.en: WHAT ABOUT ON THAT... THAT ARRAY?
OUR SENSORS CAN'T PENETRATE IT.
ANY IDEA WHAT THOSE PULSES ARE?
MASSIVE BURSTS OF RADIANT ENERGY.
translation.ko: 저 충격파는 정체가 뭔지 알겠나? 대량의 복사에너지로

translation.en: DIRECTED TOWARD A NEARBY G-TYPE STAR SYSTEM.
translation.ko: 대량의 복사에너지로 인근 G형 항성계로 발사합니다

translation.en: TRY HAILING THE ARRAY.
translation.ko: 인근 G형 항성계로 발사합니다 어레이에 통신 넣어

translation.en: Engineering to bridge.
We have severe damage. The Chief's dead.
translation.ko: 여기는 기관실 피해가 심각하고 실장이 죽었습니다

translation.en: Possibility of a warp core breach.
SECURE ALL SYSTEMS. I'M ON MY WAY.
translation.ko: 기관 시스템 전부 점검해 지금 가겠다

translation.en: NO RESPONSE FROM THE ARRAY.
ENSIGN, GET DOWN TO SICK BAY.
MR. ROLLINS, THE BRIDGE IS YOURS.
HARRY, WAIT FOR ME.
WHEN IT EXPLODED.
translation.ko: 계기반 폭발할 때 바로 옆에 있었나 봐

translation.en: Warning. Warp core micro-fracture.
translation.ko: 경고, 워프 코어 미세 균열 발생

translation.en: Breach imminent.
WHAT'S THE WARP CORE PRESSURE?
MAN: 2100 KILOPASCALS.
LOCK DOWN THE MAGNETIC CONSTRICTORS.
IF WE LOCK THEM DOWN AT THESE PRESSURE LEVELS
WE MIGHT NOT BE ABLE TO REINITIALIZE
THE DILITHIUM REACTION.
translation.ko: 반응로 재가동이 어려울 수 있어요 경고, 워프 코어 미세 균열, 붕괴 임박

translation.en: Warning. Warp core microfracture.
translation.ko: 경고, 워프 코어 미세 균열, 붕괴 임박

translation.en: WE'VE GOT TO GET
THE REACTION RATE DOWN BEFORE WE TRY TO SEAL IT.
translation.ko: 밀폐하기 전에 반응 속도 늦춰야 해

translation.en: COMPUTER, INITIATE EMERGENCY MEDICAL HOLOGRAPHIC PROGRAM.
STATE THE NATURE OF THE MEDICAL EMERGENCY. MULTIPLE INJURIES.
STATUS OF DOCTOR? HE'S DEAD.
.4cc's OF TRIANOLINE.
TRIANOLINE? WE LOST OUR NURSE TOO.
HOW SOON ARE REPLACEMENT MEDICAL PERSONNEL EXPECTED?
THAT COULD BE A PROBLEM.
translation.ko: 후임 의료진은 언제 도착할까요? 금방 안 될 거야 우리가 좀 멀리 왔거든

translation.en: WE'RE PRETTY FAR AWAY FROM REPLACEMENTS.
translation.ko: 금방 안 될 거야 우리가 좀 멀리 왔거든

translation.en: TRICORDER.
MEDICAL TRICORDER.
A REPLACEMENT MUST BE REQUESTED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
I AM PROGRAMMED
translation.ko: 최대한 빨리 후임이 와야 합니다 제 프로그램 설정은 단기 응급 충원입니다

translation.en: ONLY AS A SHORT-TERM EMERGENCY SUPPLEMENT.
translation.ko: 제 프로그램 설정은 단기 응급 충원입니다

translation.en: WE MAY BE STUCK WITH YOU FOR A WHILE.
translation.ko: 당분간 다른 의사 안 올 텐데

translation.en: NO NEED FOR CONCERN.
translation.ko: 당분간 다른 의사 안 올 텐데 걱정할 건 없습니다

translation.en: I AM CAPABLE OF TREATING ANY INJURY OR DISEASE.
translation.ko: 걱정할 건 없습니다 전 모든 부상과 질병을 치료할 수 있어요

translation.en: NO CONCUSSION. YOU'LL BE FINE.
CLEAN HIM UP.
UNLOCK THE MAGNETIC CONSTRICTORS.
Man: CONSTRICTORS ON-LINE. PRESSURE?
2,500 KILOPASCALS AND HOLDING.
Bridge to Janeway. We're being scanned by the array, Captain.
translation.ko: 여기는 함교 어레이가 함선을 스캔하고 있습니다

translation.en: It penetrated our shields.
WHAT KIND OF SCAN?
BRIDGE? JANEWAY TO BRIDGE. RESPOND.
INITIATE EMERGENCY LOCK OFF.
YOU CAN RETURN TO YOUR STATION.
THIS IS THE EMERGENCY HOLOGRAPHIC DOCTOR SPEAKING.
I GAVE NO PERMISSION FOR ANYONE TO BE TRANSPORTED OUT OF SICK BAY.
HELLO.
SICK BAY TO BRIDGE.
I BELIEVE SOMEONE HAS FAILED TO TERMINATE MY PROGRAM.
PLEASE RESPOND.
COME UP HERE. COME ON NOW.
I HAVE A PITCHER
translation.ko: 이리 오세요 레모네이드랑 쿠키 좀 가져왔어요

translation.en: OF LEMONADE AND SOME SUGAR COOKIES.
DON'T BELIEVE YOUR EYES, MR. PARIS.
WE'VE ONLY TRANSPORTED 100 KILOMETERS.
translation.ko: - 선장님 - 보이는 거 믿지 마 보이저에서 100km 떨어진 곳이야

translation.en: Kim: THERE'S NO INDICATION OF STABLE MATTER.
THIS MUST BE SOME KIND OF HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION.
OH, YOU POOR THINGS. YOU MUST BE TIRED.
translation.ko: 많이 지쳐 보이네요 들어와서 좀 쉬어요

translation.en: SIT DOWN AND REST A WHILE.
translation.ko: 많이 지쳐 보이네요 들어와서 좀 쉬어요 시원한 음료도 마시고

translation.en: HAVE A COLD DRINK.
NO, THANK YOU.
CAPTAIN OF THE FEDERATION
STARSHIP VOYAGER.
JUST MAKE YOURSELVES RIGHT AT HOME.
THE NEIGHBORS SHOULD BE HERE ANY MINUTE.
WHY, HERE THEY ARE.
WE'RE REAL GLAD YOU DROPPED BY.
translation.ko: 만나서 반가워요 잘 왔어요 와줘서 정말 기뻐요

translation.en: NOW WE CAN GET STARTED.
YOU ARE ALL INVITED TO THE WELCOMING BEE!
LET'S HAVE SOME MUSIC!
THE CREW'S SCATTERED AROUND THIS FARM, CAPTAIN
BUT THEY'RE ALL ACCOUNTED FOR.
translation.ko: 선원들은 농장 곳곳에 흩어져있어요 소재는 확인됐고요

translation.en: MOVE AROUND. SCAN THE AREA. SEE IF YOU CAN FIND ANYTHING
translation.ko: 돌아다니면서 잘 살펴봐 홀로그램 생성기가 어디 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: THAT MIGHT BE A HOLOGRAPHIC GENERATOR.
HAVE SOME NICE FRESH CORN ON THE COB.
FRESH CORN ON THE COB.
CORN ON THE COB? CORN ON THE COB?
CAN YOU TELL ME WHY WE'RE HERE?
translation.ko: 옥수수 드실래요? 옥수수 드려요? 왜 우릴 데려왔지?

translation.en: WE DON'T MEAN YOU ANY HARM.
translation.ko: 왜 우릴 데려왔지? 해칠 생각은 없어요

translation.en: I'M SORRY IF WE'VE PUT YOU OUT.
JUST PUT YOUR FEET UP AND GET COMFORTABLE WHILE YOU WAIT.
WAIT FOR WHAT?
ISN'T ANYBODY HUNGRY?
MAKE YOURSELVES AT HOME.
I'M SORRY IF WE PUT YOU OUT.
translation.ko: 그러지 말고 편하게 즐기세요 언짢았다면 미안해요

translation.en: LET ME SHOW YOU AROUND.
THE ROOT CELLAR'S RIGHT OVER THERE.
WHAT'S DOWN THERE?
POTATOES, ONIONS.
BUT IT'S REAL PRIVATE.
PARIS, SHE'S ONLY A HOLOGRAM.
NO REASON TO BE RUDE.
SPOROCYSTIAN LIFE SIGNS.
WHAT'S IN THE BARN?
OH, NOTHING BUT A BIG OL' PILE OF HAY.
LET'S GO SEE THE DUCK POND.
translation.ko: 맞다, 연못 보러 가요 아무것도 없어요 그냥 헛간이라니까

translation.en: IT'S JUST A DARK SMELLY BARN.
HEY, DO Y'ALL WANT SOME DEVILED EGGS?
SEE? NOTHING BUT HAY.
THERE'S A LIFE-FORM HERE. JUST ONE.
WHERE?
IT'S EVERYWHERE.
I'M ALSO READING SOME KIND
translation.ko: 매트릭스 처리 장치가 있는 것 같아요

translation.en: OF MATRIX PROCESSING DEVICE.
translation.ko: 매트릭스 처리 장치가 있는 것 같아요 홀로그램 생성기겠죠

translation.en: MAYBE THE HOLOGRAPHIC GENERATOR.
PARIS.
HUMANOID LIFE SIGNS OVER HERE.
I'M READING A VULCAN AND SEVERAL HUMANS.
translation.ko: 벌컨 한 명과 인간 대여섯 명

translation.en: I'M NOT READY FOR YOU YET!
PARIS TO JANEWAY.
JANEWAY HERE. PARIS?
COME ON.
VERY WELL.
SINCE NO ONE SEEMS TO CARE FOR ANY CORN, WE'LL HAVE TO PROCEED AHEAD OF SCHEDULE.
translation.ko: 옥수수는 싫은 것 같으니 일정을 앞당기죠

translation.en: JANEWAY TO BRIDGE. ANYBODY THERE?
Yes, Captain, we're here.
HOW LONG WERE WE OVER THERE?
ALMOST THREE DAYS.
Three days.
CAPTAIN, THE MAQUIS SHIP IS POWERING UP ITS ENGINES.
TRACTOR THEM. ALL SENIOR OFFICERS REPORT to the bridge immediately.
translation.ko: 전송 범위로 견인해 상급 장교는 모두 함교로

translation.en: COULD YOU EXPLAIN WHAT HAS TRANSPIRED?
COMPUTER, LOCATE ENSIGN KIM.
Ensign Kim is not on board.
PARIS TO JANEWAY.
Go ahead.
Kim didn't come back with us.
translation.ko: 킴이 없습니다 아직 거기 있나 봐요

translation.en: ACKNOWLEDGED.
COMPUTER, HOW MANY CREWMEN ARE UNACCOUNTED FOR?
translation.ko: 컴퓨터, 함선 이탈 선원이 몇 명이지? 한 명입니다 해리 킴 소위

translation.en: One: Ensign Harry Kim.
HAIL THE MAQUIS.
COMMANDER CHAKOTAY MY NAME IS CAPTAIN KATHRYN JANEWAY.
How do you know my name?
WE WERE ON A MISSION TO FIND YOU WHEN WE WERE BROUGHT HERE BY THE ARRAY.
translation.ko: 소령 함선을 찾으라는 임무를 받고 나왔는데

translation.en: ONE OF OUR CREWMEN IS MISSING.
WAS HE TRANSPORTED TO YOUR SHIP BY ACCIDENT?
No. A member of our crew is missing too.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저희 선원 하나도 실종된 상태입니다

translation.en: B'Elanna Torres, my engineer.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저희 선원 하나도 실종된 상태입니다 벨라나 토레스라고 엔지니어죠

translation.en: COMMANDER, YOU AND I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM.
translation.ko: 벨라나 토레스라고 엔지니어죠 나와 같은 문제를 겪고 있군

translation.en: I THINK IT MAKES SENSE TO TRY AND SOLVE IT TOGETHER
translation.ko: 나와 같은 문제를 겪고 있군 문제를 같이 해결하면 낫지 않겠나?

translation.en: Three of us will transport to your ship.
THEY'RE POWERING DOWN THEIR ENGINES
WATCH OUT, CAPTAIN. THEY'RE ARMED.
PUT DOWN YOUR WEAPONS.
YOU WON'T NEED THOSE HERE.
IT'S GOOD TO HAVE YOU BACK, MR. TUVOK.
I MUST INFORM YOU THAT I WAS ASSIGNED TO INFILTRATE YOUR CREW, SIR.
translation.ko: 전 소령님 함선에 잠입하란 임무를 받은

translation.en: I AM CAPTAIN JANEWAY'S CHIEF OF SECURITY.
WERE YOU GOING TO DELIVER US INTO THEIR WAITING HANDS, VULCAN?
translation.ko: 연방의 따뜻한 손에 우릴 넘기려고 했나?

translation.en: MY MISSION WAS TO ACCUMULATE INFORMATION ON MAQUIS ACTIVITIES
translation.ko: 제 임무는 마키의 활동 정보를 모은 뒤

translation.en: AND THEN DELIVER YOU INTO THEIR "WAITING HANDS."
translation.ko: 연방의 따뜻한 손에 조직원을 넘기는 것

translation.en: THAT IS CORRECT.
translation.ko: 연방의 따뜻한 손에 조직원을 넘기는 것 - 맞습니다 - 너도 도왔군

translation.en: I SEE YOU HAD HELP.
IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU TOO, CHAKOTAY. AT LEAST THE VULCAN
WAS DOING HIS DUTY AS A STARFLEET OFFICER
translation.ko: 그래도 이 벌컨은 임무를 수행한 거라지만

translation.en: BUT YOU... YOU BETRAYED US FOR WHAT?
FREEDOM FROM PRISON? LATINUM?
WHAT WAS YOUR PRICE THIS TIME?
YOU ARE SPEAKING TO A MEMBER OF MY CREW.
I EXPECT YOU TO TREAT HIM WITH THE SAME RESPECT
translation.ko: 내가 자네 선원을 대하는 것처럼 자네도 내 선원에게 예의를 지켜주게

translation.en: AS YOU WOULD HAVE ME TREAT A MEMBER OF YOURS.
Janeway: NOW, WE HAVE A LOT TO ACCOMPLISH AND I SUGGEST WE ALL CONCENTRATE
translation.ko: 해야 할 일이 많으니 모두 집중하고

translation.en: ON FINDING OUR PEOPLE AND GETTING OURSELVES HOME.
BASED ON MY INITIAL RECONNAISSANCE, I AM CONVINCED
translation.ko: 실종된 선원들 찾아 집으로 복귀하자고 초기 조사에 따르면

translation.en: WE ARE DEALING WITH A SINGLE ENTITY IN THE ARRAY.
translation.ko: 초기 조사에 따르면 저 어레이에는 하나의 개체가 있고

translation.en: I WOULD SUGGEST HE SCANNED OUR COMPUTERS
translation.ko: 저 어레이에는 하나의 개체가 있고 우리 쪽 컴퓨터를 스캔해

translation.en: IN ORDER TO SELECT A COMFORTABLE HOLOGRAPHIC ENVIRONMENT.
translation.ko: 우리 쪽 컴퓨터를 스캔해 홀로그램 환경을 만들어낸 것 같습니다

translation.en: IN EFFECT, A WAITING ROOM
translation.ko: 홀로그램 환경을 만들어낸 것 같습니다 말하자면 일종의 대기실로서

translation.en: TO PACIFY US PRIOR TO BIOMETRIC ASSESSMENT.
translation.ko: 말하자면 일종의 대기실로서 생체 정보 조사에 앞서 경계심을 푸는 곳이죠

translation.en: AN EXAMINATION?
translation.ko: 생체 정보 조사에 앞서 경계심을 푸는 곳이죠 조사라고요?

translation.en: IT IS THE MOST LOGICAL EXPLANATION.
WHY ELSE WOULD HE HAVE RELEASED US UNHARMED?
translation.ko: 가장 논리적인 설명입니다 아니면 왜 우리가 멀쩡히 돌아왔겠어요?

translation.en: NOT ALL OF US WERE.
BREAK OUT THE COMPRESSION PHASER RIFLES.
MEET US IN TRANSPORTER ROOM TWO.
WE'RE GOING BACK.
MR. TUVOK, WHILE CHAKOTAY AND I ARE LOOKING
translation.ko: 팀을 나누지 투박, 차코테와 내가 토레스와 킴 찾는 동안

translation.en: FOR TORRES AND KIM
translation.ko: 투박, 차코테와 내가 토레스와 킴 찾는 동안

translation.en: YOUR JOB IS TO FIND OUT AS MUCH ABOUT THIS ARRAY
translation.ko: 투박, 차코테와 내가 토레스와 킴 찾는 동안 저 어레이를 철저히 조사해

translation.en: AS YOU CAN.
IT BROUGHT US HERE.
WE HAVE TO ASSUME IT CAN SEND US HOME.
AGREED?
MR. ROLLINS, MAINTAIN RED ALERT.
KEEP US ON CONSTANT TRANSPORTER LOCKS.
translation.ko: 롤린스 적색경보 지속하고 전송 포착 유지해

translation.en: CAPTAIN.
I'D LIKE TO GO WITH YOU.
IF THIS HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH CHAKOTAY...
translation.ko: 저도 가겠습니다 차코테와 관련된... 아닙니다, 전...

translation.en: IT DOESN'T. I JUST...
I'D HATE TO SEE ANYTHING HAPPEN TO HARRY.
COME ON.
THERE ARE NO HUMANOID LIFE-FORMS INDICATED, CAPTAIN.
KIM AND TORRES
translation.ko: 킴과 토레스는 트라이코더 범위에 잡히지 않아요

translation.en: ARE NOT WITHIN TRICORDER RANGE.
translation.ko: 킴과 토레스는 트라이코더 범위에 잡히지 않아요 여기 없을 수도 있어요

translation.en: HE CAN TELL US WHERE THEY ARE.
translation.ko: 여기 없을 수도 있어요 저자에게 물어보죠

translation.en: MAINTAIN YOUR COM LINK.
I DON'T WANT TO LOSE ANYONE ELSE.
OH, WHY HAVE YOU COME BACK? YOU DON'T HAVE WHAT I NEED.
translation.ko: 왜 또 왔어? 너희한텐 그게 없어

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU NEED AND I DON'T CARE.
I JUST WANT OUR PEOPLE BACK AND I WANT US ALL TO BE SENT HOME.
translation.ko: 우리 선원들 찾아 돌아가기만 하면 돼

translation.en: WELL, NOW, AREN'T YOU CONTENTIOUS FOR A MINOR BIPEDAL SPECIES.
translation.ko: 하찮은 인간 종족치고 너무 대드는 거 아냐?

translation.en: THIS MINOR BIPEDAL SPECIES DOESN'T TAKE KINDLY TO BEING ABDUCTED.
translation.ko: 이 하찮은 인간 종족이 납치는 못 참거든

translation.en: IT WAS NECESSARY.
WHERE ARE OUR PEOPLE?
THEY'RE NOT HERE. WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?
translation.ko: - 진작 떠났지 - 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: YOU DON'T HAVE WHAT I NEED.
THEY MIGHT.
NO. YOU'LL HAVE TO LEAVE THEM.
translation.ko: - 그래, 그냥 두고 가 - 그럴 순 없어

translation.en: WE WON'T DO THAT.
translation.ko: - 그래, 그냥 두고 가 - 그럴 순 없어 그들은 우리 부하고

translation.en: WE ARE THEIR COMMANDING OFFICERS.
translation.ko: 그들은 우리 부하고 안전한지 확인해야 해

translation.en: WE ARE ENTRUSTED WITH THEIR SAFETY.
THAT MAY BE A CONCEPT YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND.
translation.ko: 물론 넌 그런 거 이해 못 하겠지

translation.en: OH, NO. I DO UNDERSTAND
BUT I HAVE NO CHOICE.
THERE JUST IS NOT ENOUGH TIME LEFT.
translation.ko: 이제 진짜 시간이 얼마 안 남았거든

translation.en: LEFT FOR WHAT?
I MUST HONOR A DEBT THAT CAN NEVER BE REPAID
translation.ko: 내가 진 빚은 평생 못 갚을 거야

translation.en: BUT MY SEARCH HAS NOT BEEN GOING WELL.
translation.ko: 아무리 찾으려고 해도 찾을 수가 있어야지

translation.en: TELL US WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR. MAYBE WE CAN HELP YOU FIND IT.
translation.ko: 뭘 찾는지 말하면 우리가 도와줄 수도 있어

translation.en: YOU?
I'VE SEARCHED THE GALAXY WITH METHODS BEYOND YOUR COMPREHENSION.
translation.ko: 인간의 지식을 뛰어넘는 방법으로도 못 찾았어

translation.en: NO. THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO.
YOU'VE TAKEN US 70,000 LIGHT YEARS FROM OUR HOME.
translation.ko: 당신이 우릴 이 먼 곳에 데려왔잖아

translation.en: WE HAVE NO WAY BACK UNLESS YOU SEND US AND WE WON'T LEAVE WITHOUT THE OTHERS
translation.ko: 실종된 선원과 함께 우릴 돌려보내 줘야지

translation.en: BUT SENDING YOU BACK IS TERRIBLY COMPLICATED.
DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND?
I DON'T HAVE TIME.
NOT ENOUGH TIME!
HE'S REGAINING CONSCIOUSNESS.
HOW DO YOU FEEL?
WHAT AM I DOING HERE? WHERE AM I?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 여기 있어? 여긴 어디야?

translation.en: PLEASE DON'T TRY TO MOVE YET.
translation.ko: 내가 왜 여기 있어? 여긴 어디야? 움직이지 마세요 많이 아플 거예요

translation.en: YOU'RE VERY ILL.
ILL? NO, NO. THERE'S SOME MISTAKE. I'M NOT...
NO!
CAPTAIN'S LOG. STARDATE 48315.6.
WE'VE TRACED THE ENERGY PULSES FROM THE ARRAY
translation.ko: 선장 일지 우주력 48315.6 어레이에서 방출하는 충격파를 추적하니

translation.en: TO THE FIFTH PLANET OF THE NEIGHBORING SYSTEM
translation.ko: 어레이에서 방출하는 충격파를 추적하니 인근 항성계 5번째 행성으로 향했고

translation.en: AND BELIEVE THEY MAY HAVE BEEN USED IN SOME FASHION
translation.ko: 인근 항성계 5번째 행성으로 향했고 그 충격파를 이용해

translation.en: TO TRANSPORT KIM AND TORRES TO THE PLANET'S SURFACE.
translation.ko: 킴과 토레스를 그 행성으로 보낸 것 같다

translation.en: COME IN.
CAPTAIN, I'VE OBSERVED SOMETHING PECULIAR ABOUT THE PULSES.
THEY'RE GETTING FASTER.
THE INTERVAL BETWEEN EACH PULSE
HAS DECREASED BY .47 SECONDS SINCE WE ARRIVED.
I CAN OFFER NO EXPLANATION.
THAT'S ONLY ONE OF THE MYSTERIES WE'RE DEALING WITH.
translation.ko: 이해 안 되는 게 어디 그뿐이겠나?

translation.en: TAKE A LOOK AT THIS.
NOT ONE OCEAN. NOT ONE RIVER.
translation.ko: 영락없는 사막이야 바다도 없고 강도 없어

translation.en: IT HAS ALL THE BASIC CHARACTERISTICS
translation.ko: 강도 없어 M급 행성의 기본 성질이 다 존재하는데

translation.en: OF AN M-CLASS PLANET, EXCEPT...
translation.ko: M급 행성의 기본 성질이 다 존재하는데

translation.en: THERE ARE NO NUCLEOGENIC PARTICLES
translation.ko: M급 행성의 기본 성질이 다 존재하는데 대기에 뉴클리오제닉 입자가 보이질 않아

translation.en: IN THE ATMOSPHERE.
THAT WOULD MEAN THE PLANET IS INCAPABLE
translation.ko: 대기에 뉴클리오제닉 입자가 보이질 않아 그럼 행성이 비를 만들 수 없는 거네요

translation.en: OF PRODUCING RAIN.
translation.ko: 그럼 행성이 비를 만들 수 없는 거네요

translation.en: I'VE STUDIED THOUSANDS OF M-CLASS PLANETS.
translation.ko: 수많은 M급 행성을 연구했지만 뉴클리오제닉 입자가 대기에 없는 건 처음이야

translation.en: I'VE NEVER SEEN AN ATMOSPHERE WITHOUT NUCLEOGENICS.
translation.ko: 뉴클리오제닉 입자가 대기에 없는 건 처음이야 거대한 자연재해가 있었던 게 분명해

translation.en: THERE MUST HAVE BEEN SOME KIND OF EXTRAORDINARY ENVIRONMENTAL DISASTER.
AS SOON AS REPAIRS ARE COMPLETE...
WE'LL SET A COURSE FOR THE FIFTH PLANET.
CAPTAIN.
YOU REQUIRE SLEEP.
KIM'S MOTHER CALLED ME JUST AFTER HE LEFT EARTH.
translation.ko: 킴이 지구를 떠난 후 그 모친과 통화했어

translation.en: DELIGHTFUL WOMAN.
HE'S HER ONLY SON.
HE'D LEFT HIS CLARINET BEHIND.
SHE WANTED TO KNOW IF SHE HAD TIME TO SEND IT.
I HAD TO TELL HER NO.
DO YOU KNOW HE PLAYED THE CLARINET IN THE JUILLIARD YOUTH SYMPHONY?
translation.ko: 킴이 줄리아드 유스 심포니에서 클라리넷 연주한 거 알아?

translation.en: I DID NOT HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO MEET MR. KIM.
I BARELY KNEW HIM.
I NEVER SEEM TO HAVE THE CHANCE TO GET TO KNOW ANY OF THEM.
translation.ko: 이제껏 누굴 제대로 알 기회가 없었지

translation.en: I HAVE TO, UM...
I HAVE TO TAKE MORE TIME TO DO THAT.
IT'S A FINE CREW AND I'VE GOT TO GET THEM HOME.
THE CREW WILL NOT BENEFIT FROM THE LEADERSHIP
OF AN EXHAUSTED CAPTAIN.
translation.ko: 선장님께서 그렇게 지쳐계시면 선원들은 아무것도 못 합니다

translation.en: YOU'RE RIGHT AS USUAL.
I'VE MISSED YOUR COUNSEL, TUVOK.
I AM GRATIFIED THAT YOU CAME AFTER ME SO I CAN OFFER IT ONCE AGAIN.
translation.ko: 절 찾으러 와주셔서 조언도 드릴 수 있네요

translation.en: I SPOKE TO YOUR FAMILY BEFORE I LEFT.
ARE THEY WELL? WELL, BUT WORRIED ABOUT YOU.
THAT WOULD NOT BE AN ACCURATE PERCEPTION, CAPTAIN.
VULCANS DO NOT WORRY.
THEY... MISS YOU.
AS I DO THEM.
I'LL GET YOU BACK TO THEM.
THAT'S A PROMISE, TUVOK.
CAPTAIN'S LOG, SUPPLEMENTAL:
VOYAGER AND THE MAQUIS SHIP HAVE ENTERED A DEBRIS FIELD
translation.ko: 선장 일지 보충 마키 함선과 보이저는 잔해 지대에 들어섰고

translation.en: WHERE SENSORS HAVE DETECTED A SMALL VESSEL.
translation.ko: 마키 함선과 보이저는 잔해 지대에 들어섰고 작은 선박 1척을 발견했으며

translation.en: ONE HUMANOID LIFE-FORM IS ON BOARD.
HAIL THEM.
translation.ko: 휴머노이드 하나가 탑승한 상태다 통신 연결

translation.en: Whoever you are, I found this waste zone first.
translation.ko: 댁들 누군지 몰라도 여긴 내가 먼저 왔어

translation.en: WE'RE NOT INTERESTED IN THIS DEBRIS, MISTER...?
Neelix.
And since you're not interested in my "debris"
well, I'm delighted to know you.
CAPTAIN KATHRYN JANEWAY OF THE FEDERATION STARSHIP VOYAGER.
translation.ko: 연방 스타쉽 보이저의 캐스린 제인웨이 선장이다

translation.en: A very impressive title.
I have no idea what it means
translation.ko: 직함이 참 기시네요 무슨 뜻인지는 몰라도 엄청 있어 보여요

translation.en: but it sounds very impressive.
translation.ko: 무슨 뜻인지는 몰라도 엄청 있어 보여요

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW THIS AREA OF SPACE WELL, MR. NEELIX?
translation.ko: 닐릭스, 이 구역을 잘 알고 있나?

translation.en: I am famous for knowing it well.
How may I be of service?
DO YOU KNOW ABOUT THE ARRAY
THAT'S SENDING ENERGY PULSES TO THE FIFTH PLANET?
I know enough to stay as far away from it as possible.
translation.ko: 그 근처엔 얼씬도 말아야 하는 건 알죠

translation.en: Wait, let me guess.
You were whisked away from somewhere else in the galaxy
and brought here against your will.
SOUNDS AS THOUGH YOU'VE HEARD THIS STORY BEFORE.
translation.ko: 자네는 전에도 그런 얘길 들어본 것 같군

translation.en: Sadly, yes, thousands of times.
Well, hundreds of times.
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 그래요 수천 번쯤 되나? 수백 번인가 보다

translation.en: Maybe 50 times.
But the caretaker has been bringing
ships here for months now.
THE CARETAKER?
That's what the Ocampa call him.
They live on the fifth planet.
Did he kidnap members of your crew?
AS A MATTER OF FACT, HE DID.
It's not the first time.
DO YOU KNOW WHERE HE'S TAKEN THEM?
Just that they're brought to the Ocampa.
Nothing more.
WE'D APPRECIATE ANY HELP YOU COULD GIVE US IN FINDING THESE OCAMPA.
translation.ko: 그 오캄파 찾는 걸 도와주면 좋겠는데

translation.en: I-I-I really wish that I could help you, I do. But as you can see
there's just so much debris for me to investigate today.
translation.ko: 그런데 보시다시피 오늘 연구할 잔해가 많아요

translation.en: You'd be surprised the things of value
translation.ko: 그런데 보시다시피 오늘 연구할 잔해가 많아요 쓸모없다고 버린 게 은근 돈이 됩니다

translation.en: some people abandon.
translation.ko: 쓸모없다고 버린 게 은근 돈이 됩니다

translation.en: OF COURSE, WE'D COMPENSATE YOU FOR YOUR TROUBLE.
translation.ko: 우릴 도와주면 그에 대해 보상할 거야

translation.en: Well, there's really very little that you could offer me.
Unless...
YES?
Unless, of course you had...
...water?
IF YOU HELP US FIND OUR MISSING CREW MEMBERS
YOU CAN HAVE ALL THE WATER YOU WANT.
translation.ko: 우리 선원 찾는 걸 도와주겠다면 물은 얼마든지 줄 수 있어

translation.en: Well, that... that sounds like a very reasonable arrangement.
translation.ko: 그럼 아주 합리적인 거래인 것 같네요

translation.en: GOOD. WE'LL BEAM YOU OVER AND TOW YOUR SHIP INTO OUR SHUTTLE BAY.
translation.ko: 좋아, 자넨 이쪽으로 전송하고 선박은 격납고로 견인하지

translation.en: MR. TUVOK, GO TO TRANSPORTER ROOM TWO AND MEET OUR GUEST.
Beam?
WE HAVE A TECHNOLOGY
WHICH CAN TAKE YOU INSTANTLY FROM YOUR SHIP TO OURS.
IT'S QUITE HARMLESS.
MAY WE?
ENERGIZE.
ASTONISHING!
YOU FEDERATIONS ARE OBVIOUSLY AN ADVANCED CULTURE.
THE FEDERATION IS MADE UP OF MANY CULTURES.
I AM VULCAN.
NEELIX.
GOOD TO MEET YOU.
INTERESTING.
WHAT, WHAT EXACTLY...
( laughing )
WHAT EXACTLY DOES ALL THIS... ALL THIS DO?
I ASSURE YOU THAT EVERYTHING IN THIS ROOM HAS A SPECIFIC FUNCTION.
translation.ko: 이 안의 모든 건 각자 기능이 있습니다

translation.en: HOWEVER, IT WOULD TAKE SEVERAL HOURS TO EXPLAIN IT ALL.
I SUGGEST WE PROCEED TO YOUR QUARTERS.
PERHAPS YOU WOULD CARE FOR A BATH.
A WHAT?
IT'S OKAY.
IT'S OKAY. WHO ARE YOU?
MY NAME IS KIM-- HARRY KIM.
I'M AN ENSIGN ON THE STARSHIP VOYAGER.
I WAS KIDNAPPED FROM THE ARRAY
JUST LIKE YOU WERE.
translation.ko: 나도 그 어레이에 납치당했어 - 여긴 어딘지 몰라 - 스타플릿이 왜 왔지?

translation.en: WHAT WAS STARFLEET DOING AT THAT ARRAY?
translation.ko: - 여긴 어딘지 몰라 - 스타플릿이 왜 왔지?

translation.en: WE WERE LOOKING FOR YOU, ACTUALLY.
WE'RE IN THE BADLANDS, THEN...
YOU MEAN YOU WERE TRYING TO CAPTURE US.
YEAH... CONSIDER YOURSELF CAPTURED.
OH, I KNOW I HAVE A PHASER HERE SOMEWHERE.
I DON'T FIND THIS AMUSING, STARFLEET.
Kim: THERE'S NO POINT.
IT'S LOCKED.
HEY, WHAT'S THAT GOING TO ACCOMPLISH?
WHAT ARE THEY DOING TO US?
translation.ko: 뭘 어쩌겠다고? 대체 뭘 한 거야?

translation.en: WHAT ARE THESE THINGS GROWING ON US?
translation.ko: 대체 뭘 한 거야? 몸 안에 뭐가 있냐고?

translation.en: DO YOU WANT THEM TO SEDATE YOU AGAIN?
YOU'RE RIGHT, STARFLEET.
IT'S THE KLINGON HALF OF ME.
IT'S JUST IT'S HARD TO CONTROL IT SOMETIMES.
translation.ko: 감정 조절이 안 될 때가 있어

translation.en: WHAT'S YOUR NAME, MAQUIS?
B'ELANNA.
B'ELANNA TORRES.
I HOPE YOU'RE FEELING BETTER.
I KNOW HOW FRIGHTENING ALL THIS MUST BE FOR BOTH OF YOU.
translation.ko: 두 분 모두 많이 놀랐을 겁니다

translation.en: I'VE BROUGHT SOME CLOTHES IF YOU CARE TO CHANGE.
WHY ARE YOU HOLDING US HERE?
YOU ARE NOT PRISONERS.
IN FACT, WE CONSIDER YOU HONORED GUESTS.
AS LONG AS YOU ARE NOT VIOLENT
YOU ARE FREE TO LEAVE YOUR QUARTERS.
WHAT'S WRONG WITH US?
translation.ko: 온순하게만 계신다면 밖으로 나오셔도 돼요 뭘 한 겁니까?

translation.en: WHAT ARE THESE THINGS?
WE REALLY DON'T KNOW.
YOU MUST BE HUNGRY.
WOULD YOU CARE TO JOIN ME ON THE COURTYARD FOR A MEAL?
OUR FOOD DISPENSERS ARE RIGHT THIS WAY.
WE'RE UNDERGROUND.
Ocampa Doctor: OUR SOCIETY IS SUBTERRANEAN.
WE'VE LIVED HERE FOR OVER 500 GENERATIONS.
BEFORE THAT, YOU LIVED ON THE SURFACE?
UNTIL THE WARMING BEGAN.
THE WARMING?
WHEN OUR SURFACE TURNED INTO A DESERT AND THE CARETAKER CAME TO PROTECT US.
OUR ANCIENT JOURNALS TELL US HE OPENED A DEEP CHASM IN THE GROUND
translation.ko: 옛 문건에 의하면 땅에 깊은 골을 내시어

translation.en: AND LED OUR ANCESTORS TO THIS PLACE.
SINCE THEN, HE HAS PROVIDED FOR ALL OUR NEEDS.
translation.ko: 그 후로 지금까지 저희를 돌봐주고 계세요

translation.en: THEY KNOW YOU'VE COME FROM THE CARETAKER.
translation.ko: 케어테이커께서 두 분을 보내신 걸 알고 모였네요

translation.en: NONE OF US HAS EVER SEEN HIM.
THIS WAY, PLEASE.
DOES THE CARETAKER PROVIDE YOUR MEALS TOO?
IN FACT, HE DOES.
HE DESIGNED
AND BUILT THIS ENTIRE CITY FOR US AFTER THE WARMING.
translation.ko: 이 지하 도시 전체를 설계해 지으셨어요

translation.en: THE FOOD PROCESSORS DISPENSE NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS EVERY 4.1 INTERVALS.
IT MAY NOT OFFER THE EXOTIC TASTE
SOME OF OUR YOUNGER PEOPLE CRAVE THESE DAYS
translation.ko: 요즘 젊은이가 찾는 이국적 음식은 없지만

translation.en: BUT IT MEETS OUR NEEDS.
Kim: IS THIS HOW THE CARETAKER COMMUNICATES WITH YOU?
Doctor: HE NEVER COMMUNICATES DIRECTLY.
translation.ko: 이걸로 케어테이커와 대화하나요? 직접 말씀하시진 않아요

translation.en: WE TRY TO INTERPRET HIS WISHES AS BEST WE CAN.
HOW HAVE YOU INTERPRETED THE CARETAKER'S REASON
FOR SENDING US HERE?
WE BELIEVE HE SEPARATED YOU
FROM YOUR OWN SPECIES FOR THEIR PROTECTION.
translation.ko: 두 분 종족을 보호하려고 보내셨을 겁니다

translation.en: THEIR PROTECTION?
FROM YOUR ILLNESS.
PERHAPS HE IS TRYING TO PREVENT A PLAGUE.
WE WEREN'T SICK UNTIL WE MET YOUR CARETAKER.
translation.ko: 전염병을 막으려고 하시는 것 같아요 여기 오기 전에 우린 멀쩡했어

translation.en: FROM TIME TO TIME, HE ASKS US TO CARE FOR PEOPLE WITH THIS DISEASE.
translation.ko: 병에 걸린 자들을 저희에게 부탁하곤 하세요

translation.en: IT'S THE LEAST WE CAN DO.
THERE HAVE BEEN OTHERS-- LIKE US?
YES.
WHERE ARE THEY?
YOUR CONDITION IS SERIOUS.
WE DON'T KNOW EXACTLY HOW TO TREAT IT.
I'M AFRAID THE OTHERS DID NOT RECOVER.
SIR...
Neelix: AH, HELLO, MR. VULCAN. COME IN. COME IN.
translation.ko: 벌컨 씨, 들어오세요 잘 보이지도 않네요

translation.en: PLEASE, I CAN HARDLY SEE YOU.
I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR YOUR HOSPITALITY.
I MUST ADMIT, I HAVEN'T HAD ACCESS TO A FOOD REPLOR... UH, REPLICATOR BEFORE.
translation.ko: 그 식품 복지기였나 복제기는 처음 써봤어요

translation.en: I'D NEVER HAVE GUESSED.
translation.ko: 그러셨겠죠 물에 몸 담그고 있으니 뭐가 좋은 줄 알아요?

translation.en: AND TO IMMERSE MYSELF IN WATER... OH, DO YOU KNOW WHAT JOY THIS IS?
translation.ko: 물에 몸 담그고 있으니 뭐가 좋은 줄 알아요?

translation.en: NO ONE AROUND HERE WASTES WATER IN THIS MANNER.
translation.ko: 여기서 이런 호사는 나만 누린다는 거요 샤워라고는 끽해야 모래 문지르기가 다인데

translation.en: A GOOD SAND SCRUB-- THAT'S THE BEST THAT WE CAN HOPE FOR.
I'M PLEASED YOU'RE ENJOYING YOURSELF,
BUT WE'RE IN ORBIT OF THE FIFTH PLANET.
WE NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE.
OH, UH, COULD YOU HAND ME THE, UH... TOWEL?
IF YOU WILL SCAN THE LARGE SOUTHERN CONTINENT
YOU'LL FIND A RANGE OF EXTINCT VOLCANOES.
translation.ko: 커다란 남쪽 대륙을 스캔해보시면 사화산이 늘어선 게 보일 거예요

translation.en: FOLLOW THE FOOTHILLS NORTH UNTIL YOU DISCOVER A DRY RIVER BED.
translation.ko: 그걸 따라 북쪽으로 가면 마른 강바닥이 나오고

translation.en: YOU'LL FIND AN ENCAMPMENT THERE.
DO YOU BELIEVE
OUR PEOPLE MIGHT BE AT THIS LOCATION?
translation.ko: 실종자들이 거기에 있다는 겁니까? 가능한 일이죠 아마도요

translation.en: IT'S NOT IMPOSSIBLE... MAYBE...
PERHAPS NOT, BUT WE'LL FIND THEM.
WE'LL NEED SEVERAL CONTAINERS OF WATER TO BRING FOR BARTER.
translation.ko: 물물교환해야 하니까 물 서너 통 챙기세요

translation.en: DO THESE, UH, REPLICATORS MAKE CLOTHING, AS WELL?
YES.
translation.ko: 그 복제기란 게 옷도 만드나요? 네

translation.en: WILL IT MAKE ME A UNIFORM LIKE YOURS?
NO...
IT MOST CERTAINLY WILL NOT.
Paris: WHY WOULD ANYONE WANT TO LIVE IN A PLACE LIKE THIS?
THE RICH CORMALINE DEPOSITS ARE VERY MUCH IN DEMAND.
THE OCAMPA USE IT FOR BARTER?
NOT THE OCAMPA, THE KAZON-OGLA.
THE KAZON-OGLA? WHO ARE THE KAZON-OGLA?
translation.ko: 오캄파는 아니고 케이존 오글라가요 케이존 오글라? 그건 또 누구야?

translation.en: THEY ARE.
translation.ko: 케이존 오글라? 그건 또 누구야? 저기 있네요

translation.en: KAZON SECTS CONTROL THIS PART OF THE QUADRANT.
SOME HAVE FOOD, SOME HAVE ORE, SOME HAVE WATER.
translation.ko: 식량, 광석, 물을 따로 쥐고 있으면서

translation.en: THEY ALL TRADE, AND KILL EACH OTHER FOR IT.
translation.ko: 거래도 하고, 뺏으려고 서로 죽이기도 하죠

translation.en: YOU SAID THE OCAMPA HAD OUR PEOPLE.
translation.ko: 오캄파한테 가는 거 아니었어? 친구들! 다시 보니 반갑다!

translation.en: MY FRIENDS! IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU AGAIN!
I MUST SPEAK WITH YOUR MAJE, THE EVER WISE JABIN.
translation.ko: 너희 수장 보러 왔어 현명한 마주 제이빈

translation.en: IT'S VERY AMUSING.
I... I ENJOY A JOKE
AS MUCH AS THE NEXT MAN.
JABIN! MY OLD FRIEND!
W-WATER... WATER, JABIN.
I HAVE WATER... TO REPLACE ALL THAT I BORROWED.
translation.ko: 이제까지 빚진 거 다 갚고도 남을 만큼

translation.en: SHOW THEM, MR. PARIS.
THEIR SHIP HAS TECHNOLOGY THAT MAKES WATER OUT OF THIN AIR!
translation.ko: 이 사람들은 기계로 허공에서 물을 만들어!

translation.en: YOU HAVE MORE?
JANEWAY TO VOYAGER. ENERGIZE.
THERE'S MORE WHERE THAT CAME FROM IF YOU CAN HELP US.
translation.ko: 우릴 도와주면 더 줄 수도 있어

translation.en: HOW CAN WE HELP SOMEONE THAT CAN CREATE WATER OUT OF THIN AIR?
translation.ko: 허공에서 물도 만들면서 무슨 도움이 필요하지?

translation.en: THIS MAN LED US HERE SUGGESTING WE MIGHT FIND A PEOPLE CALLED THE OCAMPA.
translation.ko: 저자가 여기에 오캄파가 있다며 우릴 데려왔어

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW WHERE THEY ARE?
translation.ko: 저자가 여기에 오캄파가 있다며 우릴 데려왔어 어디 있는지 아나?

translation.en: OCAMPA?
SHE IS OCAMPA.
WHY WOULD YOU BE INTERESTED IN SUCH
translation.ko: 저 여자가 오캄파다 왜 저런 쓸모없는 종족에 관심을 두지?

translation.en: WORTHLESS CREATURES?
translation.ko: 왜 저런 쓸모없는 종족에 관심을 두지?

translation.en: THEY LIVE ONLY NINE YEARS.
THEY MAKE POOR SERVANTS.
WE CAUGHT HER WHEN SHE WANDERED
TO THE SURFACE.
YOU MEAN THEY LIVE UNDERGROUND?
THE ENTITY IN SPACE THAT GIVES THEM FOOD AND POWER GIVES THEM
SOLE ACCESS TO THIS WORLD'S ONLY WATER--
translation.ko: 저들에게 음식과 전력을 제공하는 주체가 이곳 유일의 원천으로 저들을 안내했어

translation.en: TWO MILES BELOW THE SURFACE.
THIS SAME ENTITY ABDUCTED TWO OF OUR PEOPLE.
translation.ko: 그 주체가 우리 선원 둘을 납치했어

translation.en: WE BELIEVE THEY MIGHT BE WITH THE OCAMPA.
THERE'S NO WAY TO GET TO THEM. WE TRIED.
THE ENTITY ESTABLISHED A SUBTERRANEAN BARRIER
WE CANNOT PENETRATE.
translation.ko: 그 주체가 지하에 장벽을 세워놔서 못 뚫었지

translation.en: BUT SHE GOT OUT.
OCCASIONALLY, SOME OF THEM DO FIND THEIR WAY TO THE SURFACE.
WE DON'T KNOW HOW.
THE OCAMPA SEAL THE TUNNELS AFTERWARDS.
MAYBE SHE CAN HELP THESE GOOD PEOPLE FIND A WAY DOWN.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 저 여자가 도와줄 수 있을 거야

translation.en: I'VE USED EVERY METHOD OF PERSUASION I KNOW
translation.ko: 시간 낭비야 나도 입 열게 하려고 온갖 방법을 다 썼는데

translation.en: TO GET HER TO HELP US.
translation.ko: 나도 입 열게 하려고 온갖 방법을 다 썼는데

translation.en: SHE WON'T!
THEN SHE'S WORTHLESS TO YOU.
LET US TRADE YOU WATER FOR THIS SCRAWNY LITTLE THING.
translation.ko: 우리가 물 줄 테니까 저 여자랑 바꾸자

translation.en: I'D BE MORE INTERESTED IN ACQUIRING THIS TECHNOLOGY THAT ALLOWS YOU
TO CREATE WATER FROM THIN AIR.
translation.ko: 그보단 저 기술을 알았으면 좋겠는데 허공에서 물을 만들어내는 기술

translation.en: THAT WOULD BE DIFFICULT.
translation.ko: 허공에서 물을 만들어내는 기술 그건 안 되겠어

translation.en: IT'S INTEGRATED INTO OUR SHIP'S SYSTEMS.
TELL THEM TO DROP THEIR WEAPONS.
DROP THEM, MY FRIENDS, OR HE DIES IN AN INSTANT.
translation.ko: 무기 버리라고 해! 어서 무기 버려! 아니면 너희 마주 죽인다

translation.en: DO IT!
translation.ko: 어서 무기 버려! 아니면 너희 마주 죽인다 버려! 어서!

translation.en: DO IT!
Neelix: STEP ASIDE.
COME ON!
I STRONGLY SUGGEST YOU GET US OUT OF HERE.
SIX TO BEAM UP.
MY DEAREST, DIDN'T I PROMISE I'D SAVE YOU?
Kim: LOOK. I'M SURE CAPTAIN JANEWAY IS DOING EVERYTHING SHE CAN TO FIND US.
WHAT MAKES YOU THINK ANY OF THEM ARE STILL ALIVE?
SHOULD I CALL FOR SOME HELP?
NO.
ARE YOU IN PAIN?
ARE YOU WATCHING US?
I THOUGHT WE WEREN'T PRISONERS. I WASN'T WATCHING YOU.
I WAS COMING TO GIVE YOU SOMETHING.
translation.ko: 감시한 거 아니에요 이거 주러 왔어요

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW IF IT'LL HELP. IT'S A MEDICINE.
THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO HAVE BROKEN FROM TRADITION AND LEFT THE CITY.
THE COLONY GROWS FRUITS AND VEGETABLES.
THEY DISCOVERED THAT THE MOSS THAT GROWS
ON CERTAIN FRUIT TREES HAS HEALING PROPERTIES.
I'M SORRY FOR WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO YOU.
translation.ko: 두 분 일은 정말 안 됐어요

translation.en: WE APPRECIATE THIS
translation.ko: 두 분 일은 정말 안 됐어요 정말 고맙지만 우리가 살아남을 방법은

translation.en: BUT THE ONLY WAY WE'LL SURVIVE
IS IF WE GET TO THE SURFACE AND FIND OUR OWN PEOPLE.
THE ELDERS WOULD SAY THAT'S AGAINST THE CARETAKER'S WISHES.
translation.ko: 어른들 눈에 그건 그분의 뜻이 아니에요

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU SAY?
THE CARETAKER'S BEEN BEHAVING STRANGELY FOR THE PAST SEVERAL MONTHS--
translation.ko: 케어테이커의 행동이 지난 몇 달간 이상했어요

translation.en: ABDUCTING PEOPLE, INCREASING THE POWER SUPPLY.
POWER SUPPLY?
HE'S TRIPLED THE ENERGY HE SENDS US.
WE HAVE ENOUGH TO RUN THE CITY FOR FIVE YEARS.
NOBODY KNOWS WHY?
WHEN WE ASK, WE'RE TOLD TO TRUST THE CARETAKER'S DECISIONS.
ONE PERSON DID GET TO THE SURFACE. WE NEVER SAW HER AGAIN.
translation.ko: 한 사람은 지상으로 나가 돌아오지 않았죠

translation.en: HOW?
THE TUNNELS THAT BROUGHT US HERE STILL EXIST.
BREACHES IN SECURITY BARRIER
HAVE APPEARED, LARGE ENOUGH TO GET THROUGH BUT IT STILL REQUIRES DIGGING
THROUGH METERS OF ROCK TO GET OUT.
translation.ko: 그래도 몇 미터는 더 파야 나갈 수 있어요

translation.en: CAN YOU GET US TOOLS TO DIG WITH?
IT WOULD TAKE DAYS, MAYBE EVEN WEEKS TO BREAK THROUGH.
translation.ko: 거길 뚫고 가려면 몇 주는 걸릴 거예요

translation.en: YOU HAVE TO REST. CONSERVE YOUR STRENGTH.
PLEASE... IT'S OUR ONLY CHANCE.
Tuvok: IF YOU HAD TOLD US WHAT YOU HAD PLANNED,
WE MIGHT HAVE ANTICIPATED YOUR IRRATIONAL BEHAVIOR.
IRRATIONAL? WE GOT OUT OF THERE, DIDN'T WE?
EXCUSE ME. DON'T BLAME NEELIX.
THIS IS A SICK BAY
translation.ko: 그만하시죠 여기 회의실 아닙니다 면회 시간 끝났어요

translation.en: NOT A CONFERENCE ROOM.
translation.ko: 여기 회의실 아닙니다 면회 시간 끝났어요

translation.en: EVERYONE, EXCEPT MY PATIENT, IS TO LEAVE IMMEDIATELY.
COMPUTER, END MEDICAL HOLOGRAPHIC PROGRAM.
I NEVER SHOULD HAVE GONE TO THE SURFACE.
I'M TOO CURIOUS.
I'M TOLD IT'S MY WORST FAILING.
NO. NO. IT'S A WONDERFUL QUALITY--
YOU'RE MOST ENDEARING.
WOULD YOU BE WILLING TO TAKE US UNDERGROUND TO LOOK FOR OUR MISSING CREW?
translation.ko: 우릴 지하로 안내해 선원들 찾게 도와주겠나?

translation.en: JABIN WAS RIGHT. THERE'S NO WAY DOWN.
translation.ko: 제이빈 말이 맞아요 거긴 못 들어가요

translation.en: THE TUNNEL I CAME OUT HAS BEEN SEALED.
WE DON'T NEED A TUNNEL.
WE HAVE THE ABILITY TO TRANSPORT THERE DIRECTLY.
CAPTAIN, OUR SENSORS DID NOT PICK UP ANY INDICATION OF AN UNDERGROUND CIVILIZATION.
THE SUBTERRANEAN BARRIER JABIN DESCRIBED MAY BE RESPONSIBLE.
IT MIGHT ALSO BLOCK OUR TRANSPORTER.
THERE ARE BREACHES
IN THE SECURITY BARRIER WHERE IT'S BEGUN TO DECAY.
THAT'S HOW I GOT OUT.
HAVE THE TRANSPORTER ROOM BEGIN A SWEEP
FOR ANY BREACHES WE MIGHT BE ABLE TO BEAM THROUGH.
translation.ko: 전송실로 가서 보호벽 스캔해 전송 가능한 틈이 있는지 알아봐

translation.en: KES CAN TELL YOU WHERE TO GO
BUT NOW THAT SHE'S FREE
WE'RE LEAVING THIS SYSTEM TOGETHER.
translation.ko: 하지만 자유를 얻었으니 저흰 여길 떠나겠어요

translation.en: NEELIX, THESE PEOPLE RESCUED ME.
I RESCUED YOU. WITH THEIR HELP.
IT WOULD BE WRONG NOT TO HELP THEM NOW.
CAPTAIN, THE PULSES FROM THE ARRAY CONTINUE TO ACCELERATE.
THE INTERVALS BETWEEN THEM
translation.ko: 선장님, 충격파 방출이 계속 빨라집니다 방출 간격이 0.8초 더 줄었어요

translation.en: HAVE DECREASED ANOTHER .8 SECONDS.
KES.
HELLO, DAGGIN.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 대건 - 다신 못 볼 줄 알았어

translation.en: WE THOUGHT WE'D NEVER SEE YOU AGAIN.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 대건 - 다신 못 볼 줄 알았어 어떻게 돌아온 거야?

translation.en: HOW DID YOU GET BACK?
translation.ko: 어떻게 돌아온 거야? 이분들이 케이존한테서 구해줬어

translation.en: THESE PEOPLE RESCUED ME.
I'M TRYING TO HELP THEM FIND TWO OF THEIR CREW.
DOES ANYONE KNOW WHERE THE ALIENS ARE KEPT-- THE ONES
THE CARETAKER SENDS HERE?
THE CENTRAL CLINIC.
CAN YOU TAKE US THERE?
NO, SHE CANNOT.
THEY CAN'T SPEAK TELEPATHICALLY. PLEASE TALK ALOUD.
translation.ko: 이 사람들 텔레파시 못 해요, 말로 하세요

translation.en: I DIDN'T MEAN TO BE RUDE
BUT YOU SHOULD NOT BE HERE.
WE'LL BE GLAD TO LEAVE ONCE WE FIND OUR CREWMEN.
THAT WON'T BE POSSIBLE. WE CANNOT INTERFERE
WITH THE CARETAKER'S WISHES.
MAYBE YOU CAN'T, BUT WE CAN.
YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND.
THAT'S RIGHT. THEY DON'T UNDERSTAND THAT THE OCAMPA
translation.ko: 이들은 몰라요 알 수가 없죠 오캄파가 너무 오래

translation.en: HAVE BEEN DEPENDENT ON THE CARETAKER FOR SO LONG
translation.ko: 알 수가 없죠 오캄파가 너무 오래 케어테이커에게 의존해

translation.en: WE CAN'T EVEN THINK FOR OURSELVES ANYMORE.
translation.ko: 케어테이커에게 의존해 생각조차 스스로 할 수 없다는 거

translation.en: THEY DON'T UNDERSTAND WE WERE ONCE A PEOPLE
translation.ko: 생각조차 스스로 할 수 없다는 거 또한 한때는 우리가

translation.en: WHO HAD FULL COMMAND OF OUR MINDS' ABILITIES.
THE STORIES OF OUR ANCESTORS COGNITIVE ABILITIES
translation.ko: 우리 생각을 완전히 지배했다는 거 조상에게 인지 능력이 있었다는 건 터무니없고

translation.en: ARE APOCRYPHAL--
translation.ko: 조상에게 인지 능력이 있었다는 건 터무니없고

translation.en: AT THE VERY LEAST EXAGGERATED.
translation.ko: 조상에게 인지 능력이 있었다는 건 터무니없고 과장된 이야기입니다

translation.en: WE LOST THOSE ABILITIES BECAUSE WE STOPPED USING THEM.
WE SHOULD NOT DWELL ON WHAT'S BEEN LOST BUT ON ALL THAT'S BEEN GAINED.
translation.ko: 잃은 것에 연연하지 말고 얻은 것에 감사해야지

translation.en: WE'VE GAINED A TALENT FOR DEPENDENCE FOR SIMPLY TAKING WHAT WE'RE GIVEN.
I'M HELPING THEM WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT
translation.ko: 당신이 좋든 싫든 난 이분들 도울 거고

translation.en: AND I THINK MY FRIENDS WILL JOIN ME.
translation.ko: 당신이 좋든 싫든 난 이분들 도울 거고 내 친구들도 함께할 거예요

translation.en: YOU DEFIED THE CARETAKER BY GOING TO THE SURFACE, KES.
LEARN FROM THE EXPERIENCE.
FOLLOW THE PATH HE HAS SET FOR US.
translation.ko: 경험으로부터 깨닫고 케어테이커님의 뜻을 따르도록 해

translation.en: I'VE LEARNED VERY WELL, TOSCAT. I SAW THE SUNLIGHT.
I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT OUR CARETAKER WOULD FORBID US TO OPEN OUR EYES
translation.ko: 케어테이커님도 우리가 눈을 떠 하늘을 보는 걸

translation.en: AND SEE THE SKY.
translation.ko: 케어테이커님도 우리가 눈을 떠 하늘을 보는 걸 막진 않으실걸요

translation.en: COME WITH ME. WE'LL FIND YOUR PEOPLE.
COME ON.
DON'T LET IT BEAT YOU, STARFLEET. COME ON.
I'M SORRY.
ALL RIGHT.
IT'S ALL RIGHT. WE'LL REST A MINUTE.
MAYBE I'D DO BETTER IF I HAD KLINGON BLOOD IN ME.
translation.ko: 나한테도 클링온 피가 흐르면 좀 나을 텐데

translation.en: TRUST ME. IT'S MORE TROUBLE THAN IT'S WORTH.
translation.ko: 그런 생각 마 득보다 손해가 커

translation.en: YOU KNOW, I SPENT MY WHOLE LIFE GETTING READY FOR STARFLEET
AND ON MY VERY FIRST MISSION
I'M GOING TO DIE.
WE'RE NOT FINISHED YET.
I KNOW A FEW THINGS THAT OLD SNEEZY DIDN'T TEACH IN HIS SURVIVAL COURSE.
translation.ko: 난 스니지가 생존 수업에서 안 가르쳐준 기술도 좀 알아

translation.en: SNEEZY?
translation.ko: 난 스니지가 생존 수업에서 안 가르쳐준 기술도 좀 알아 스니지?

translation.en: COMMANDER ZAKARIAN. REMEMBER?
HE MUST HAVE BEEN ALLERGIC TO EVERYTHING.
YOU WENT TO THE ACADEMY.
I ACTUALLY MADE IT INTO THE SECOND YEAR
BEFORE WE MUTUALLY AGREED THAT IT WASN'T THE PLACE FOR ME.
translation.ko: 2년 다니다가 그만뒀어 나랑 안 맞는다고 소령님과 얘기했지

translation.en: YOU KNOW,
I NEVER REALLY LIKED ZAKARIAN.
SHH. LISTEN.
THEY'RE GETTING FASTER.
Rollins: Voyager here.
WHAT'S GOING ON WITH THE ARRAY?
IT'S NO LONGER SENDING OUT PULSES, CAPTAIN
AND IT APPEARS TO BE REALIGNING ITS POSITION.
Keep me informed. Janeway out.
THEY HAVEN'T BEEN AT THE CLINIC FOR HOURS.
WE CAN SEARCH THE CITY. ASK IF ANYONE'S SEEN THEM.
IF THEY WERE TRYING TO GET TO THE SURFACE,
HOW WOULD THEY GO? PROBABLY THE SAME WAY I DID--
translation.ko: 여기서 나가려 했다면 어디로 갔을까? 저처럼 터널 중 하나로 갔을 거예요

translation.en: UP ONE OF THE ANCIENT TUNNELS.
translation.ko: 저처럼 터널 중 하나로 갔을 거예요

translation.en: MR. PARIS, YOU AND NEELIX GO WITH HER AND START CHECKING THEM OUT.
WE NEED TO TALK TO EVERY DOCTOR AND NURSE
SEE WHAT THEY CAN TELL US ABOUT TORRES AND KIM.
translation.ko: 클리닉의 의료진 모두 찾아서 토레스와 킴에 대해 물어봐야 해

translation.en: Rollins: Voyager to Janeway.
GO AHEAD.
CAPTAIN, THE ARRAY IS FIRING SOME KIND OF WEAPON
AT THE SURFACE.
translation.ko: 어레이가 행성을 향해 무기를 발사합니다 전력 도관을 봉쇄하려는 것 같아요

translation.en: IT SEEMS TO BE TRYING TO SEAL THE ENERGY CONDUITS.
Understood. Keep a channel open.
IF THE ARRAY IS THE OCAMPA'S SOLE SOURCE OF ENERGY,
WHY WOULD THE CARETAKER SEAL THE CONDUITS?
translation.ko: 어레이가 오캄파의 단일 전력원인데 왜 도관을 봉쇄하죠?

translation.en: HE WOULD SEAL THEM
translation.ko: 왜 도관을 봉쇄하죠? 이제 도관을 사용하지 않으려는 거죠

translation.en: IF HE NO LONGER INTENDED TO USE THEM
TO PROTECT THE OCAMPA FROM THEIR ENEMIES.
CAPTAIN, THERE IS NOW ENOUGH EVIDENCE TO FORM A REASONABLE HYPOTHESIS.
translation.ko: 이제 이 모든 일의 설명이 가능합니다

translation.en: I BELIEVE THAT THE CARETAKER IS DYING.
EXPLAIN.
FIRST, HE INCREASES THE ENERGY SUPPLY TO PROVIDE A SURPLUS
translation.ko: 첫째, 전력 공급량을 필요 이상으로 늘려서

translation.en: TO LAST FIVE YEARS, THEN SEALS THE CONDUITS.
THE LOGICAL CONCLUSION IS
HE NO LONGER INTENDS TO CONTINUE AS CARETAKER.
THAT DOESN'T MEAN HE'S DYING. HE COULD BE LEAVING.
translation.ko: 죽어간다는 건 아니지 떠나는 걸 수 있어

translation.en: NOT AFTER A MILLENNIUM OF PROVIDING FOR THESE PEOPLE.
translation.ko: 아닐 겁니다 이 사람들을 천 년이나 돌봤어요

translation.en: I BELIEVE THAT THE CARETAKER OWES SOMETHING TO THE OCAMPA.
translation.ko: 이 사람들을 천 년이나 돌봤어요 오캄파에게 뭔가 빚진 게 있을 거예요

translation.en: I BELIEVE THE DEBT THAT CAN NEVER BE REPAID
translation.ko: 오캄파에게 뭔가 빚진 게 있을 거예요 평생 갚지 못할 빚이란

translation.en: IS VERY LIKELY A DEBT TO THEM.
translation.ko: 평생 갚지 못할 빚이란 오캄파에게 진 빚이겠죠

translation.en: IN ADDITION, THERE WERE HIS FREQUENT REFERENCES
TO RUNNING OUT OF TIME.
I THINK HE KNEW HIS DEATH WAS IMMINENT.
translation.ko: 자신이 곧 죽을 걸 알았던 겁니다

translation.en: IF HE DIES, HOW THE HELL ARE WE SUPPOSED TO GET HOME?
THEY'RE IN THIS ONE.
HARRY?
PARIS TO JANEWAY.
Go ahead.
THEY'RE IN ONE OF THE TUNNELS, CAPTAIN.
I CAN'T SEE THEM, BUT THEY'RE UP THERE. WE'RE GOING AFTER THEM.
CALL FOR TRANSPORT WHEN YOU HAVE THEM.
WE'LL MEET YOU ON THE SHIP.
JANEWAY TO VOYAGER. Rollins: Voyager here.
THREE TO BEAM UP.
Rollins: Stand by.
CAPTAIN, I CAN'T GET A LOCK ON YOU.
The Array's weapon fire has irradiated the planet's crust.
translation.ko: 어레이에서 행성 표면에 방사선을 쏘고 있어서

translation.en: THE TRANSPORT SENSORS CAN'T FIND THE BREACHES IN THE SECURITY BARRIER.
translation.ko: 전송 센서가 보호벽 틈을 못 찾습니다

translation.en: COME ON. THERE'S ONLY ONE OTHER WAY OUT OF HERE.
Janeway to Paris.
GO AHEAD.
The transporters aren't working.
You'll have to find a breach in the security barrier
when you get to the top.
UNDERSTOOD.
We're a few minutes behind you.
Janeway out.
I SEE THEM.
IT TOOK YOU LONG ENOUGH.
HOW COULD I LET DOWN THE ONLY FRIEND I GOT?
translation.ko: 오래 걸리셨네요 유일한 친구가 실망하면 안 되잖아

translation.en: FRIEND? WHAT MAKES YOU THINK I'M YOUR FRIEND?
PARIS TO JANEWAY. WE FOUND THEM, CAPTAIN.
DON'T WAIT FOR US. GET THEM TO SAFETY.
translation.ko: 기다리지 말고 안전한 곳으로 데리고 가

translation.en: DON'T WORRY. I KNOW WHERE WE CAN GET THROUGH THE BARRIER.
WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T TOUCH IT.
WE'VE BEEN TOLD IT'LL BURN YOUR SKIN OFF.
Janeway: THEY'RE NOT FAR AHEAD OF US. KEEP GOING.
translation.ko: 그리 멀리 있지 않아 계속 움직여

translation.en: I THINK WE'VE REACHED THE TOP.
NEELIX, GET OUT YOUR PHASER.
Paris: VOYAGER, CAN YOU GET A LOCK ON US NOW?
Affirmative, but I'm reading only five signals.
THE OTHERS ARE...
GET DOWN!
PARIS TO JANEWAY.
CHAKOTAY, TUVOK, DO YOU READ?
VOYAGER, PREPARE TO TRANSPORT EVERYONE IN THIS GROUP EXCEPT ME.
translation.ko: 보이저, 나만 빼고 이 사람들 전송하라

translation.en: YOU'RE NOT THINKING OF GOING BACK THERE.
THE FOOL NEEDS COMPANY.
TAKE CARE OF THEM, DEAREST. I'LL SEE YOU LATER.
VOYAGER, MAKE THAT THREE TO BEAM UP.
LOCK IN ON THE OTHER COMBADGE
translation.ko: 보이저, 세 명 전송하라 무전 배지 포착하고 전송해

translation.en: AND ENERGIZE.
MY LEG IS BROKEN.
I CAN'T MOVE.
HOLD ON.
NEELIX, HELP ME WITH TUVOK.
I'LL GET CHAKOTAY.
BEFORE THE WHOLE THING COMES DOWN.
I INTEND TO... AS SOON AS I GET YOU UP.
THOSE STAIRS WILL COLLAPSE.
WE'LL BOTH DIE.
YEAH?
BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IF I SAVE YOUR BUTT, YOUR LIFE BELONGS TO ME.
translation.ko: 반대로 제가 구해드리면 소령님 목숨은 제 거예요

translation.en: ISN'T THAT SOME KIND OF INDIAN CUSTOM?
WRONG TRIBE.
I DON'T BELIEVE YOU.
YOU'D RATHER DIE THEN LET ME BE THE ONE TO RESCUE YOU?
FINE. BE A FOOL.
IF I HAVE TO DIE, AT LEAST I'LL HAVE THE PLEASURE
translation.ko: 좋아, 밑져야 본전이지 이대로 죽는다면 너도 같이 죽는 거니까

translation.en: OF WATCHING YOU GO WITH ME.
translation.ko: 이대로 죽는다면 너도 같이 죽는 거니까

translation.en: Paris: ISN'T THERE SOME INDIAN TRICK WHERE YOU CAN TURN YOURSELF INTO A BIRD
translation.ko: 원주민 마법 모르세요? 가령 새로 변신해서

translation.en: AND FLY US OUT OF HERE?
YOU'RE TOO HEAVY.
GO AHEAD.
Two Kazon ships are approaching the Array.
SET A COURSE. I'M ON MY WAY.
translation.ko: 케이존 함선 2척이 어레이로 접근합니다 - 항로 설정하고 기다려 - 우린 그만 돌아간다

translation.en: WE'VE GOT TO GET BACK TO OUR SHIP.
translation.ko: - 항로 설정하고 기다려 - 우린 그만 돌아간다

translation.en: I STRONGLY ADVISE YOU TO REST.
I WILL NOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CONSEQUENCES.
translation.ko: 무조건 쉬어야 해요 이러다 쓰러지시면 책임 못 져요

translation.en: IS THE CREW ALWAYS THIS DIFFICULT?
I DON'T KNOW, DOC. IT'S MY FIRST MISSION.
DOESN'T ANYONE KNOW HOW TO TURN OFF THE PROGRAM WHEN THEY LEAVE?
translation.ko: 누구 하나 프로그램 종료를 안 하네

translation.en: BRING THE WEAPONS SYSTEMS ON-LINE.
Tuvok: POWERING UP PHASER BANKS AND PHOTON SYSTEMS.
translation.ko: 페이저 뱅크 가동 광자 시스템 가동

translation.en: RED ALERT.
IS HAILING US, CAPTAIN.
ON SCREEN.
Jabin: Have you come to investigate the entity's strange behavior too?
ALL WE CARE ABOUT IS GETTING HOME.
WE'RE TRANSPORTING TO THE ARRAY TO TRY TO ARRANGE IT.
translation.ko: 어레이로 가서 그 방법을 논의할 거고

translation.en: I'm afraid I cannot permit that.
WE HAVE NO DISPUTE WITH YOU.
I have a dispute with anyone who would challenge us.
translation.ko: 우리한테 대들면 싸울 수밖에 기가 막히군

translation.en: WE HAVE NO INTENTION OF CHALLENGING YOU.
I have no intention of letting anyone
with your technological knowledge board the Array.
translation.ko: 어레이에 탑승하게 둘 순 없지 제이빈, 이성적으로 이 문제를 논의...

translation.en: CAN WE DISCUSS THIS LIKE CIVILIZED...?
Tuvok: THEY'RE POWERING UP THEIR WEAPONS.
I GUESS WE CAN'T.
SHIELDS ARE HOLDING.
FIRE PHASERS. EVASIVE PATTERN DELTA FOUR.
Janeway to Chakotay.
Tuvok and I are beaming to the Array.
Can you hold off the Kazon?
I THINK SO, CAPTAIN.
GOOD.
MR. PARIS, TAKE THE CONN.
YES, MA'AM.
Janeway: MAINTAIN TRANSPORTER LOCKS, ENSIGN.
translation.ko: 전송 포착 유지해 비상 전송 상황이다

translation.en: EMERGENCY BEAM OUT STATUS. AYE, CAPTAIN.
translation.ko: 전송 포착 유지해 비상 전송 상황이다 알겠습니다

translation.en: THE DATA PROCESSING SYSTEM IS BEHIND THIS WALL, CAPTAIN.
translation.ko: 데이터 처리 시스템이 이 뒤에 있습니다

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO.
WELL... YOU'RE NOTHING IF NOT PERSISTENT.
WE NEED YOU TO SEND US BACK WHERE WE CAME FROM.
OH... THAT ISN'T POSSIBLE.
I BARELY HAVE ENOUGH STRENGTH TO COMPLETE MY WORK.
translation.ko: 내 일을 완수할 힘도 남아있지 않아

translation.en: YOU'RE SEALING THE CONDUITS BEFORE YOU DIE.
translation.ko: 죽을 걸 알고 도관을 봉쇄하는 거지

translation.en: IF I DON'T, THE KAZON WILL STEAL THE WATER.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 케이존이 물을 훔쳐갈 테니까

translation.en: BUT IN A FEW YEARS
WHEN THE OCAMPA'S ENERGY RUNS OUT
translation.ko: 얼마 지나지 않아 오캄파의 전력이 동나면 다 소용없겠지

translation.en: IT WON'T MATTER.
THEY'LL BE FORCED TO COME TO THE SURFACE AND THEY WON'T BE ABLE TO SURVIVE.
translation.ko: 결국 지상으로 올라와 다 죽게 될 거야

translation.en: SOMETHING YOU DID TURNED THEIR PLANET INTO A DESERT DIDN'T IT?
translation.ko: 당신 때문에 행성이 사막으로 변한 거지?

translation.en: THAT WAS THE DEBT THAT COULD NEVER BE REPAID.
translation.ko: 그게 평생 갚지 못할 빚인 거고

translation.en: WELL, WE'RE EXPLORERS FROM ANOTHER GALAXY
BUT WE HAD NO IDEA THAT OUR TECHNOLOGY
WOULD BE SO DESTRUCTIVE TO THEIR ATMOSPHERE.
translation.ko: 그런데 생각지도 못하게 우리 기술이 그곳 대기권에 치명적이더군

translation.en: TWO OF US WERE CHOSEN TO STAY BEHIND AND CARE FOR THEM.
translation.ko: 두 명이 여기 남아 저들을 돌보기로 했어

translation.en: THERE'S ANOTHER LIKE YOU HERE?
translation.ko: 두 명이 여기 남아 저들을 돌보기로 했어 다른 사람이 또 있어?

translation.en: NOT ANYMORE.
NO, NO. SHE...
SHE WENT OFF TO LOOK FOR MORE INTERESTING PLACES.
WHY WERE YOU BRINGING SHIPS HERE INFECTING PEOPLE WITH A FATAL ILLNESS?
translation.ko: 왜 사람들을 데려와 질병을 감염시켜 죽였지?

translation.en: OH, THEY... THEY DIDN'T DIE OF AN ILLNESS.
THEY DIED BECAUSE THEY WERE INCOMPATIBLE.
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 죽은 건 호환이 안 돼서야

translation.en: "INCOMPATIBLE"?
I'VE BEEN SEARCHING THE GALAXY
FOR A COMPATIBLE BIO-MOLECULAR PATTERN.
IN SOME INDIVIDUALS
I FOUND CELLULAR STRUCTURES
translation.ko: 일부 개체에서 유사한 세포 조직도 발견했지만...

translation.en: THAT WERE SIMILAR, BUT...
YOU'VE BEEN TRYING TO PROCREATE?
I NEEDED SOMEONE TO REPLACE ME
SOMEONE WHO'D UNDERSTAND
THE ENORMOUS RESPONSIBILITY OF CARING FOR THE OCAMPA.
translation.ko: 막중한 책임감을 느끼고 오캄파를 돌볼 사람

translation.en: ONLY MY OFFSPRING COULD DO THAT.
DID YOU EVER CONSIDER ALLOWING THE OCAMPA TO CARE FOR THEMSELVES?
translation.ko: 오캄파 스스로 자신을 지키게 할 생각은 없었어?

translation.en: THEY'RE CHILDREN. CHILDREN HAVE TO GROW UP.
MOST OF THE SPECIES WE'VE ENCOUNTERED
translation.ko: 우리도 탐험가야 우리가 만난 종족 대부분이 고난을 극복하며 살아

translation.en: HAVE OVERCOME ALL KINDS OF ADVERSITY
translation.ko: 우리가 만난 종족 대부분이 고난을 극복하며 살아

translation.en: WITHOUT A CARETAKER.
IT'S THE CHALLENGE OF SURVIVING ON THEIR OWN THAT HELPS THEM TO EVOLVE.
translation.ko: 스스로 생존하는 법을 배우며 진화하는 거지

translation.en: MAYBE YOUR CHILDREN WILL DO BETTER THAN YOU THINK.
translation.ko: 생각보다 그 아이들이 더 잘해낼 수도 있어

translation.en: Kim: Voyager to Janeway.
GO AHEAD. We've got problems here.
KAZON GOT SOME BACKUP.
We need more time.
CAN YOU HOLD THEM OFF FOR ANOTHER FEW MINUTES?
We'll do our best.
THEIR WEAPONS ARRAY HAS BEEN HIT.
THEY'RE IN TROUBLE.
NEITHER OF US HAS ENOUGH FIREPOWER TO STOP THAT SHIP.
I'M SETTING A COLLISION COURSE, BUT THE GUIDANCE SYSTEM IS DISABLED.
I'LL HAVE TO PILOT THE SHIP MANUALLY.
GET THE CREW READY TO BEAM TO VOYAGER AND DROP SHIELDS FOR TRANSPORT.
translation.ko: 선원들과 보이저로 가 전송하게 쉴드 내리고

translation.en: PARIS, MY CREW IS COMING OVER.
TELL ONE OF YOUR CRACKERJACK STARFLEET TRANSPORTER CHIEFS
translation.ko: 패리스, 선원들을 보내겠다 거기 늠름한 수송실장한테 나 놓치지 말라고 해

translation.en: TO KEEP A LOCK ON ME.
translation.ko: 거기 늠름한 수송실장한테 나 놓치지 말라고 해

translation.en: I'M GOING TO TRY AND TAKE SOME HEAT OFF YOUR TAIL.
Acknowledged.
BUT DON'T THINK FOR A SECOND THIS MAKES US EVEN, CHAKOTAY.
YOUR LIFE IS STILL MINE.
Paris out.
I'M GETTING YOU OUT OF THERE, CHAKOTAY.
Paris: YOU'RE BREAKING UP!
Stand by to transport.
WAIT!
NOW!
Paris: Transporter Room Two, do you have him?
THEY'VE GOT ME.
CAPTAIN, I CAN ACCESS THE SYSTEM
translation.ko: 선장님 연방 영공으로 보내줄 시스템 접속은 가능하지만

translation.en: TO SEND US BACK TO FEDERATION SPACE
translation.ko: 연방 영공으로 보내줄 시스템 접속은 가능하지만

translation.en: BUT IT WILL TAKE SEVERAL HOURS TO ACTIVATE.
UNLESS YOU HELP US.
OH, I WISH I COULD, BUT I HAVE VERY LITTLE TIME LEFT.
translation.ko: 그러고 싶지만 이제 정말 시간이 없어

translation.en: SO I HAVE INITIATED A SELF-DESTRUCT PROGRAM.
IF YOU DESTROY THE ARRAY WE'LL HAVE NO WAY TO GET HOME.
translation.ko: 어레이가 파괴되면 우린 돌아갈 방법이 없어

translation.en: THE OCAMPA'S ENEMIES CANNOT BE ALLOWED TO CONTROL THIS INSTALLATION.
translation.ko: 오캄파의 적이 이곳을 장악해선 안 돼

translation.en: IN MINUTES, IT WILL BE DESTROYED.
YOU HAVE TO GO.
GO NOW!
Tuvok: THE CARETAKER.
Paris: A Kazon vessel
JUST COLLIDED WITH THE ARRAY, CAPTAIN.
Affirmative.
STAND BY.
( voice faltering ): The termination program
translation.ko: 자폭 프로그램이 손상됐다 이제 이 어레이는 파괴되지 않을 것이나

translation.en: has been damaged.
translation.ko: 이제 이 어레이는 파괴되지 않을 것이나 파괴되어야 한다

translation.en: The Kazon must not
translation.ko: 파괴되어야 한다 케이존이 이곳을 장악해선 안 된다

translation.en: gain control of this installation.
translation.ko: 케이존이 이곳을 장악해선 안 된다 그들은 오캄파를 몰살할 것이다

translation.en: SHALL I ACTIVATE THE PROGRAM TO GET US BACK?
AND WHAT HAPPENS TO THE OCAMPA AFTER WE'RE GONE?
translation.ko: 우리가 가고 나면 오캄파는 어떻게 되지?

translation.en: CAPTAIN, ANY ACTION WE TAKE TO PROTECT THE OCAMPA
WOULD AFFECT THE BALANCE OF POWER IN THIS SYSTEM.
translation.ko: 이곳 힘의 균형에 영향을 줄 겁니다

translation.en: THE PRIME DIRECTIVE WOULD SEEM TO APPLY.
WOULD IT?
WE NEVER ASKED TO BE INVOLVED, TUVOK...
BUT WE ARE.
WE ARE.
MR. TUVOK, READY THE TRICOBALT DEVICES.
Tuvok: AYE, CAPTAIN. OPEN A CHANNEL TO THE KAZON.
Kim: CHANNEL OPEN.
translation.ko: 연결됐습니다 미리 경고하지 우리 측 함선 더 불렀어

translation.en: I have called for additional ships.
translation.ko: 미리 경고하지 우리 측 함선 더 불렀어

translation.en: I'M CALLING TO WARN YOU TO MOVE YOUR VESSELS TO A SAFE DISTANCE.
translation.ko: 선박을 안전한 거리로 이동하는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: I INTEND TO DESTROY THE ARRAY.
You can't do that.
Janeway: I CAN AND I WILL.
END TRANSMISSION.
THEY'RE INCREASING FIRE, CAPTAIN. SHIELDS ARE HOLDING.
MOVE US 400 KILOMETERS FROM THE ARRAY, MR. PARIS.
Torres: THAT ARRAY IS THE ONLY WAY WE HAVE TO GET HOME.
translation.ko: 뭐 하자는 거야? 어레이가 없으면 돌아갈 수 없어

translation.en: I'M AWARE EVERYONE HAS FAMILIES AT HOME.
translation.ko: 모두 집에 두고 온 가족이 있을 거고 나 또한 마찬가지야

translation.en: SO DO I, BUT I'M NOT WILLING TO TRADE THE LIVES OF THE OCAMPA
translation.ko: 나 또한 마찬가지야 그래도 우리 좋자고 오캄파를 등질 순 없어

translation.en: FOR OUR CONVENIENCE.
translation.ko: 그래도 우리 좋자고 오캄파를 등질 순 없어

translation.en: WE'LL HAVE TO FIND ANOTHER WAY HOME. WHAT OTHER WAY HOME IS THERE?
translation.ko: - 다른 방법을 찾는다 - 방법이 있긴 해?

translation.en: WHO IS SHE TO BE MAKING THESE DECISIONS FOR ALL OF US?
translation.ko: - 다른 방법을 찾는다 - 방법이 있긴 해? 저 여자가 뭔데 맘대로 결정해요?

translation.en: SHE'S THE CAPTAIN.
IS READY.
Paris: WE'RE IN POSITION.
FIRE.
THE LEAD KAZON SHIP IS HAILING US.
ON SCREEN.
You have made an enemy today.
Tuvok: THEY ARE WITHDRAWING, CAPTAIN.
COME IN.
YOU ASKED TO SEE ME, CAPTAIN?
MR. PARIS...
YOU HAVE A PROBLEM.
I'VE INVITED CHAKOTAY
translation.ko: 자네 큰일 났어 차코테와 마키 선원을 보이저에 합류시켰거든

translation.en: AND THE OTHER MAQUIS TO BECOME PART OF THIS CREW.
IT SEEMED THE ONLY REASONABLE THING TO DO.
WILL YOU PROVIDE A BODYGUARD FOR ME, CAPTAIN?
translation.ko: 지금 상황에선 가장 적절한 조치야 경호원 붙여주실 건가요?

translation.en: IT SEEMS YOU ALREADY HAVE ONE.
I DO?
MR. CHAKOTAY SAID SOMETHING ABOUT HIS LIFE BELONGING TO YOU.
translation.ko: 차코테가 그러더군 자기 목숨이 자네 거라고

translation.en: HE'LL BE TAKING RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR SAFETY.
I THINK I'M GOING TO ENJOY THIS.
DON'T BE SO SURE.
HE'LL ALSO BE MY FIRST OFFICER.
EVERYONE ABOARD THIS SHIP WILL REPORT TO HIM
INCLUDING THE LIEUTENANT ASSIGNED TO CONN.
ME?
I'VE ENTERED INTO THE SHIP'S LOG ON THIS DATE
THAT I'M GRANTING A FIELD COMMISSION OF LIEUTENANT TO THOMAS EUGENE PARIS.
CONGRATULATIONS.
UM, FOR THE FIRST TIME IN MY LIFE I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO SAY.
YOU'VE EARNED THIS, TOM.
I'M ONLY SORRY YOUR FATHER WON'T KNOW.
OH, HE'LL KNOW...
WHEN WE GET BACK.
CAPTAIN, WE WERE JUST COMING TO SEE YOU.
WE'VE SUPPLIED YOUR SHIP WITH WATER, NEELIX. IT'S READY TO GO.
translation.ko: 함선에 물 채워줬으니 그만 가도 좋아

translation.en: WELL, YOU SEE THAT'S WHAT WE WANTED TO DISCUSS.
WE'D LIKE TO GO WITH YOU.
I'M SORRY. THIS ISN'T A PASSENGER SHIP.
Kes: OF COURSE NOT.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 이건 여객선이 아니야 물론이죠 저희도 승객 아니에요

translation.en: WE WON'T BE PASSENGERS.
WE'LL BE VALUABLE COLLEAGUES.
"COLLEAGUES"?
translation.ko: 동료? 뭐든 필요하신 거 제가 제공하겠습니다

translation.en: WHATEVER YOU NEED IS WHAT I HAVE TO OFFER.
YOU NEED A GUIDE, I'M YOUR GUIDE.
YOU NEED SUPPLIES, I KNOW WHERE TO PROCURE THEM.
translation.ko: 보급품 필요하세요? 제가 충당할 곳 알아요

translation.en: I HAVE FRIENDS AMONG RACES YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW EXIST.
translation.ko: 선장님이 모르는 종족에 제 친구들도 있어요

translation.en: YOU NEED A COOK? YOU HAVEN'T LIVED
translation.ko: 요리사는 어때요? 제 앙글라바스크를 드셔야 비로소 삶이 완성되죠

translation.en: UNTIL YOU'VE TASTED MY ANGLA'BOSQUE.
translation.ko: 제 앙글라바스크를 드셔야 비로소 삶이 완성되죠

translation.en: IT WILL BE MY JOB TO ANTICIPATE YOUR NEEDS BEFORE YOU KNOW YOU HAVE THEM
translation.ko: 필요한 줄도 몰랐던 걸 알아내는 게 제 일이고

translation.en: AND I ANTICIPATE YOUR FIRST NEED WILL BE ME.
translation.ko: 지금 선장님께 필요한 건 바로 저네요

translation.en: Kes: CAPTAIN, WE BOTH WANT VERY MUCH TO BE A PART OF YOUR JOURNEY.
WE'RE ALONE IN AN UNCHARTED PART OF THE GALAXY.
translation.ko: 우린 은하계 미지의 영역을 홀로 항해하고 있다

translation.en: WE'VE ALREADY MADE SOME FRIENDS HERE
AND SOME ENEMIES.
WE HAVE NO IDEA OF THE DANGERS WE'RE GOING TO FACE.
BUT ONE THING IS CLEAR.
BOTH CREWS ARE GOING TO HAVE TO WORK TOGETHER
IF WE'RE TO SURVIVE.
THAT'S WHY COMMANDER CHAKOTAY AND I HAVE AGREED THAT THIS SHOULD BE ONE CREW--
translation.ko: 차코테 소령도 동의했듯 우린 하나의 선원이다

translation.en: A STARFLEET CREW.
AND AS THE ONLY STARFLEET VESSEL ASSIGNED TO THE DELTA QUADRANT
translation.ko: 델타 분면에 배정된 유일한 스타플릿 함선으로서

translation.en: WE'LL CONTINUE TO FOLLOW OUR DIRECTIVE TO SEEK OUT NEW WORLDS AND EXPLORE SPACE.
translation.ko: 우리는 스타플릿 지령에 따르며 새로운 세계를 탐험할 것이다

translation.en: BUT OUR PRIMARY GOAL IS CLEAR.
translation.ko: 우리의 최우선 목표도 잊어선 안 된다

translation.en: EVEN AT MAXIMUM SPEEDS,
IT WOULD TAKE 75 YEARS TO REACH THE FEDERATION
BUT I'M NOT WILLING TO SETTLE FOR THAT.
THERE'S ANOTHER ENTITY LIKE THE CARETAKER OUT THERE SOMEWHERE
translation.ko: 케어테이커와 같은 개체가 이곳 어딘가에 있고

translation.en: WHO HAS THE ABILITY TO GET US THERE A LOT FASTER.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 그들이 우리의 귀환을 앞당길 수 있을지 모른다

translation.en: WE'LL BE LOOKING FOR HER,
AND WE'LL BE LOOKING FOR WORMHOLES, SPATIAL RIFTS
translation.ko: 웜홀과 공간 균열도 찾아야 할 것이다

translation.en: OR NEW TECHNOLOGIES TO HELP US.
SOMEWHERE, ALONG THIS JOURNEY,
WE'LL FIND A WAY BACK.
MR. PARIS, SET A COURSE...
FOR HOME.
AYE, CAPTAIN.
